I have many other portable speakers but this one is one of the better ones.GO FOR IT.

name: Minni A.
title: Bought two, very happy and satisfief
review: I bought echo dot 3rd gen and was so happy with it that I bought echo input s week after. The ease of using without the phone or laptop is great. The sound is good enough. Obviously it cannot compare with big standalone speaker. I have connected the dot to my big speakers and using input in any room I want because it is portable

name: Priya Rajagopalan
title: Good for music lovers and smart homes not a product for working men n women
review: Echo dot as a device it's really good.. the sound effect is pretty loud more than expected.. on software side it needs lots of improvement. The microphone won't work for calls or meetings.. so this echo dot device is pretty good for music lovers and smart homes but not for regular use.. we can't use this device like other Bluetooth devices.. n one more main issue u can't carry it bcoz it needs to plugged in to work..

name: Arpan
title: echo dot 3rd gen experience is not good so far
review: Twice it happened to me that the echo dot device got unresponsive everyone we reser the WiFi router. The device is unable to access the Internet connection. Tried every possible way, even considering ntacted the customer service. Still the problem was not solved. Another annoying thing is the replaced item is not new one rather refurbished.

name: Manisha Chhabra
title: Pathetic Products
review: Not at all worthy. Wastage of money. Performance is not good. And Amazon is not cooperating for return. I got the exchange product today but as usual the set up button is so uncomfortable and its painful to press it for a longer time. And the sound quality is so pathetic that music doesn't seems to melodies. It feels like a non branded local speaker. As usual the wrist product from Amazon. Really unexpected from a Amazon. Very disappointing and Amazon team is not even ready to give my money back.

name: pushpa
title: Consider this only if you are ok with random things otherwise you need a lot of patience for this.
review: What I hate is it skips songs from a playlist.I have saved Sundarkand which has 4 parts in Amazon music.Alexa skips part 2 or 3 and plays the next one.This has happened 4-5 times.I have written to alexa help center but no response on this.I have gone back to mobile app .

name: Antony a.
title: Not worth  .its cheap quality
review: I bought eco 3rd generation for just rupees 2499 on 15days bk. I returned product after too days it's working sometimes only always we need to go for reset mode and connect it. I don't understand such a non compatible product why amazon incresing price day by day. It's a local China product .they need to increase quality

name: SJOHN
title: All-new Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - Smart speaker with Alexa-- Just Okey
review: using this product for couple of weeks now... its not really value for the money unless you have all Alexa compatible devices at home and has an amazon prime subscription! many of the "other" product like smartTV or Bluetooth speakers will not work properly( you may require individual product applications to allow connectivity to Alexa!!)Mainly there is no built-in battery; hence require to be connected to power always!!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Intelligentie helpful  family member at economic deal .
review: Every time we have to start with 'ALEXA" That make her member of our family.Sound quality is amazing in 20 ×18 ft room.Comment all device in my house as far as 30 MTR.She understand some hindi words too. Like "ALEXA GAANA BAJA" and Alexa start as per past choice, same way ""Alexa chup" and it stop..!!!Updates are great .. just love it.

name: Amit Sinha
title: Very good product
review: It is very good but not searching like Google, maximum time reply that I don't know....limited news & radio station.. More improvement required. If you want to know about some one, alexa reply "don't know" but Google always tell about that.

name: GSingh
title: Cute dot
review: This is a mini speaker with decent sound output. It connects with apple & android devices by WiFi or Bluetooth. We can use it as a Bluetooth speaker. It's my children's favourite toy. Better than giving them phone 📱/ tablet / TV 📺 .Only drawback is that it must be connected to a power souce.

name: Suresh Payannavar
title: Don't buy this product it will stop working after 1 year.
review: Hi FriendsDon't buy this product after 1 year it will stop working automatically. So don't waste your hard earned money. I have purchased this product on 24th Oct 2018 now it's stopped working. Investing 4k for one year it's not worth so don't buy this product.

name: Kashyap Rawat
title: Doesn't respond well, keep getting disconnected, breaking sound, always keep yelling alexa alexa
review: It doesn't listen maxium times, limited to few apps and most time it goeso n to a red mode where it says wifi problem or it can't understand. So him many times sin this world I should keep saying alexa alexa... It fails to understand commands properly and this setup issue. Mmn then to connect to my cel phone Bluetooth was another saga. N now again it's not connecting.I think those who want a good speakers should go for JBL, harman or bose or other brands with just manual Bluetooth option and not waste money in this

name: Milan J.
title: If you get a good deal buy it.
review: I was looking for portable speakers and I got a great deal on Echo For which had these additional features.I bought it for the following reasons:1. Workable sound quality2. AI features3. It is the future :PThings that might tick you:1. It isn't portable, needs a plug at all times,2. Connecting to WiFi may get you white hair,3. Alexa doesn't listen to you at all times, If you yell on Alexa then you might get some from your parents saying 'Have you lost it!!'Enjoy :-D

name: Lionking
title: Bang for the buck
review: This was my second Echo device for another room. Really happy with the voice quality. Amazon earlier used to provide Echo dot with micro usb pin which means it could be played outdoor with a suitable powerbank but the 3rd gen echo dot has a proprietary power pin which rules out the outdoor use altogether. Nevertheless, happy with the product.

name: Pads
title: Good but older iteration is better
review: The older version of echo dot is better w.r.t sound quality, though this has a better volume speaker. Other features are as with the earlier version, works great , BT is good, mic has long range detection , Alexa works great as always.

name: Ashima
title: Not clear in instructions
review: Well it was an offer with 12 watt smart bulb. Offer said pay 200 rs more and get 12 watt bulb. Unfortunately did not say anywhere that the price if alexa will be reduced abd bulb would cost me 700 rs.That was misleading. I could have saved the money. Sorry but feel like cheated.

name: Aman Verma
title: Alexa, you are really smart!
review: Let me tell you this, the speaker used inside echo dot 3 can be really too loud. It's an amazing device with lot of skills that can be added. Works flawlessly on detecting trigger commands and answers with some good wit. The most important part of it being able to train on multiple skills. I bought it during the sale with Syska smart bulb, and after configurig the device, the bulb can 3 controlled easily from alexa. I have also paired it up with my fire stick .Go for it guys you won't regret a smart device like her.

name: Arpit Parekh
title: Alexa is indeed smart and helpful.
review: This product is really amazing. I also got Wipro smart lamp for free during sale. This is so addictive. Voice recognition is very good. Though I found google assistant more smarter and knowledgeable, Alexa is also very good. There are so many skills.

name: Manjunath
title: Never get bored if you are music lover (Just say play song name)
review: Need to integrate with Kannada FM channels and news channels. It’s playing only ajtak news headlines.We don’t have option to change name of Alexa .If they add new feature it’s plus point for them.Apart from this for me it’s worth to buy below 2.5k.

name: SVS
title: MY FIRST EXPERIENCE OF AI SPEAKER
review: This was my first purchase of AI speaker and I must tell that I am very happy the way this market has begun.Surely there is lot to improve but what the package is offering at current price on the new product category launch is very impressive.Connectivity with firestick can be improved a bit, currently pause and resume command works good but finding the movie and hit play is hard process.Other then that look is awesome but I have heared google home and I would say that google sound was little better then echo.Still highly recommend this one.

name: Verified buyer
title: Good speakers at a very good price
review: Got this speaker in a flash sale. Bought it for my daughter and she enjoys having conversation with alexa and she is happy that alexa can help her with playing her favourite songs. amazing technology. go for it . you will not be disappointed. get the feel of experience.

name: Michael Dias
title: Smart Device
review: Bought this some time ago and relatively happy with the purchase. One thing to ensure, is that you set the language to English, india. Mine was set as English, US. The device had difficulty picking up my accent as it is on the neutral side. There have been plenty of times where Alexa just does not understand me, or understands me wrong, and that was quite frustrating. I eventually switched the language as the other echo dot I had gifted to my parents used an Indian accent. Once done, it's been pretty smooth sailing and Alexa is quite helpful. I can update my calendar with voice control now. I can also control a LED bulb from syska which came as a bundled deal in one of the Amazon shopping festivals. The audio quality is fantastic, my only grouse is they should have probably included a rechargeable battery.

name: Rohan Jadhav
title: Must have for a smart home
review: Alexa is one of the best things that you can purchase if you want to upgrade to a smart lifestyle. I have become completely dependent on Alexa now. It plays songs directly from amazon music, helpful for setting reminders, alarms, asking random questions, and most important of all, to toggle on/off the lights without having to get up.

name: Prem_Physique
title: Amazing product
review: Its cute,its loud,its simply amazing. It needs very littke space and it becomes one in your family. I use alexa to play a lot of music and control few smart home devices(lights,tv etc). And it never disappoints only wish it had a built in battery.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Useful 5 stars...But beware of privacy
review: Arrived very fast and in good condition.. Sound very clear compared to mobile speakers..The Alexa app in google play has bugs..I had to reinstall Alexa app to change the wake word.. .Very useful..Helps in saving time...Only Concern is privacy...Note: Even mute button does not stop recording...Only way is to turn off the switch to safeguard privacy when in important conversations or when not in use...

name: Siddharth U
title: Best smart speaker for starters.
review: Writing this review after about a month of use and I gotta say it is the best in the class in my point of view. I haven't used Google home mini so I can't make comparisons on its hardware.But software wise, Alexa is on par with Google assistant in India as well. Many devices such as Android TVs and smart bulbs support both Alexa and Google assistant without any issues.Bought this for ₹2999 on the Great Indian festival sale let me some up the pros when compared to 2nd gen echo dot1. There are 4 directional mics as compared to two on the 2nd gen which translates to better and increase range of response to your voice.2. More speakers and they now fire from all around the sides of the echo dot rather than the top which is more louder and clearer than the 2nd gen. They can't be compared to the bigger siblings at this price. It's good enough.3. It has a more rounded finish around the speakers and the top compared to the boxy construction of the 2nd gen. It also has a fabric finish around the speakers which feels aesthetically good.Alexa lives in the cloud, so new features will come to all devices. It works with all the apps mentioned in the pics.Note: Change your preferred music service to Saavn in the Alexa app for a better experience. It has more songs than prime music

name: Abhishek
title: Alexa Echo Dot 3rd Gen
review: It's works amazingly well.Connecting it to wifi is very simple nd easy.If u r not able to understand from the user guide.See 1 or 2 videos on YouTube ...it's very Simple

name: Sagar Thorat
title: Version issue in Amazon Echo dot purchased in PRIME DAY SALE
review: The echo dot which I purchased in the Prime day sale is of an older version. When I try to update it with the guidelines given on Amazon's official site, my Alexa says the device is up to date. The version showing for my Alexa is 1308943236 whereas the Latest version is "Echo Dot (3rd Generation) Latest Software Version: 2584225924". The reason why Amazon is selling the devices at a cheaper rate is they are selling the older versions which are not up to date. And the device is not getting updated also. My friend bought the device before a sale and he has the updated version and mine is older.

name: Srid
title: A really nice smart speaker
review: I initially had a thought that this is still in a premature stage but after activating some of the Alexa skills I am able to get most of the things that I was looking for. Really awesome product and the price I got this for in Amazon sale makes it worth for every single paisa spent. Simply awesome.

name: krishna k.
title: Long way to go Alexa
review: At 50% volume sould quality is good , beyond that it’s sounds horribleBiggest drawback, alexa doesn’t respond on full volume at 4 ft distanceAlexa application hangs up very often and stops the responseBluetooth connectivity, lagging most of the time

name: Rohan
title: Failed to respond
review: Maybe I was unlucky as Alexa at times didn’t respond to voice commands. We have jiofiber at home with speeds upto 150 mbps, given the internet speeds Alexa should not have problems with responding to voice commands. Returned the product and was disappointed, could be one of defective product.

name: SK
title: Better sound put poor mic
review: First of all cheers to cloudtail. As always great service and genuine products. This 3rd gen Dot is much better in aspect of sound quality ( the speaker role) in comparison to the last gen , but the reduction of 7 mics to 4 is clearly recognizable. Another thing is while it's playing something ( musics , news or simply voice feedback) it fails to pickup any command. You may shout "Alexa" and it still won't listen to you until you are as close as 1 inch away from it or press the Alexa command button. That is very disappointing and kills the basic notion of handsfree smart speaker

name: Bharat Sharma
title: Overall good for above 10 years children not for above 30 years.
review: I like the sound clarity with Alexa interaction but Alexa most of the things and questions didn't identify and she is not known about the questions. That is the minus point here. I saw Google Assistant is better than the Alexa because Google can make the call to your contacts but Alexa is only for those people who installed the Alexa Application on their phone.

name: rakesh
title: 100% for English, hindi and <60%useful for south Indian languages
review: Not even 60% fit for south Indians even after adding tamil skills..most of the tamil or telegu songs it is unable to understand. Best options for training kids with english rhymes or songs.

name: Tejas patil
title: Distorted songs
review: Was using spotify first, started hearing distortion in almost every song, i though it might be because of spotify, so i linked my apple music even though m getting distorted songs! M not getting what to do should I replace or no

name: Bhalchandra jadhav
title: Very good product....
review: It's a very good product but when asked to play songs of Hindi movies or singers it plays Very different songs or the songs that have been sung by those in Karaoke apps. Some slight improvement has been seen of late.Also while answering questions about places , distances etc. it fails Many times.

name: Anju Yadav
title: A cheapest product that i bought ,use less product
review: Don't get fooled by it's look.it doesn't save electricity ,it works only when it's getting charge.if you want to listen musics you will have to be amazon prime costumer for which you have to pay 129 rupees per month.SO PLEASE DON'T BY THIS PRODUCT

name: Anshu
title: bad
review: when I setup echo dot after 2 hours it told sorry I have trouble understanding right now please try a little later i tried after 2 hours it was not fixed and then I replaced the item and again after 2 hours then told the same thing and again I waited but it was not fixed then i baught google nest mini it was working

name: prasanna jha
title: Sound quality is not as expected
review: I am writing for this product because i returned it. I usually never return any product but i had a bad experience with this Eco Dot 3.Sound quality was not as expected and even Alexa voice command not recognized but it during playing song on it max volume. Sound was cracking, that's why i returned it.

name: Varun Malhotra
title: Do not recommend
review: Most of the times response is "Sorry i don't know". To play video you need to add akill, to play audio you need to add skillto play movies you need to add skill. I mean seriously? Is Amazon so dumb that they want user to add all those skills manually instead of adding them by default?It cannot connect to smart tv, poor voice recognition, you literally have to shout so that she can here it. If you say "Alexa play nursery rhymes on Youtube on fire tv" it will say I don't know what is YouTube. WTH Man!

name: Pooja
title: Amazing 🙌
review: Best AI assistant right now!It just works and understands Indian accent very well.Speaks both Hindi and English fluentlyMany hidden features are also there which you can find in alexa app, like link your Spotify account, can control your TV (some brands), smart lights.Best AI assistant for beginners and as a gift to parents.One advice if you are buying your 1st alexa buy this one, avoid the wireless battery one becz it doesn't recognise your voice sometimes and dosent have the cool ring light !

name: M Rajan
title: It does  not work!
review: Only question it answered was what's the weather today?" that was after setup.for every question it keeps saying "sorry, I am having trouble understanding right now. Please try a little later."It has been 10 days. I have changed rooms, distance from wall, furniture, questions, tone, every thing.Nothing works!

name: Amber
title: Fabulous product must buy guys
review: It's amazing product my daughter want alexa and now she is very happy I m rating used after 2 months fabulous product i m speechless must by guys its very helpful and it's very funny entertaining and math solver with funny games And jokes and horror stories + normal stories easy to setup with different languages And volume is very good low - high and etc must buy and thnx amazon for this geourgeous product

name: Sunil Singh
title: Not responding as it was after 6 months
review: My Echo has stopped responding as it used to. Now you have to repeat couple of times to get the desire response at times it is quite frustrating..Sound has also decrease.. I was glad that I was contacted by amazon and replacement was scheduled. Return was picked up on 30th Sept. Since then I am following up with customer care and I have been telling that it will be dispatched within 24 hrs. I still see the same status (Item is not yet been dispatched) for order. Can someone please response with some concrete response?? I also wrote email to customer care but no response there..

name: Smitha Manoj
title: Awesome in every aspect except the playlist
review: Voice recognition, response etc are flawless except that it picks up same annoying songs again and again. You cannot instruct Alexa to dislike an artist or stop playing particular song. In my case whenever the command is " Alexa play songs" it goes like " playlist you may like- best of Arijit Singh- there is no change in the song and the order of songs too' . No option to do it manually through Alexa app too. Fortunately I have linked my Apple music through Alexa app and am happy with the song results now. Speaker output is good till volume 6 after that there's shrill.

name: Anand Bhide
title: Good product, needs improvement
review: The Bluetooth speaker does its job really well. Sound quality is also excellent. But algorithm for Alexa is not up to the mark as yet. Especially when you ask her to play regional songs or Hindi songs. Also it does not ask you which search engine to use or which news you are interested in. It needs lot of improvement.

name: Deepak Ji
title: Please dont buy it
review: Simply the worseee device when it comes to connecting to internet....in the world where every things seems to pull off easily with the help of internet ..trust me instead of making things easier for you alexa devices especially amazon echo dot makes things ostentatiously difficult for you ....a sheer wastage of time.... stay away from it

name: Abhijeet J.
title: Awesome Project, Love It
review: I bought This Product for my parents. My parents have very interest in listening songs at morning time and this product is very important for them. My parents loved this product so much. Sometimes it happens that we want to Listen songs but we think which song i should play. Instead of this, in this AI SPEAKER you have to just say ur favourite singers name and speaker will play songs of that singers. Easy to use.

name: Vk
title: Welcome home Alexa.
review: Today we bought Eco dot anf brought Alexa to our family...we are continuously talking to alexa from last 5 hrs and dont want to sleep and keep talling its such a amazing product to have. Sound quality is great..sound recognition is awesome...we enjoyed with alexa in living room at day and now she is making us sleep...it has everything for kids and adults....soothing flute music...relaxation songs...it can help u doing excercise. It takes off your load of remembering things..just tell alexa..she will do for u. Amazing product...thanks amazon and thanls alexa. Welxome home...Bluetooth connectivity has some issur but will sort that out ..anyway if u have wifi at home then u dont need bluetooth...one should definitely buy it. I give 10 out 10 to Alexa

name: Roheet
title: 3rd gen Echo dot is awsome
review: 3rd gen Echo dot is too awsome in everything sound build quality and power adapter also GoodBut 2nd gen has 7far field microphonesAnd 3rd gen only 4 maybe thease 4 is better than 7 coz it voice recognition is too good

name: Deepak
title: Good hardware. Software leaves much to be desired.
review: I have both Google Home and Alexa.Alexa works better with smart devices. It responds much quicker to requests on turning light on/off compared to GHome, which clearly lags.However, Alexa lags GHome on answering questions and playing music. When asked to play music, it frequently responds with "Saavn is not available in your region" while playing Saavn other times. Also it's response to natural language questions is behind GHome.Speaker quality great. Speaker sensitivity excellent-it catches the wake word even when spoken from a distance. GHome lags here.

name: Varun Bhoopalam
title: Best Portable Assisstant
review: Loved my purchase and the price at which it came was even more delightful. Need to add lots of skills but works quite fine with the pre-loaded skills. Sound clarity is awesome. I'm using Alexa in my office cabin to listen to my daily prayers and other songs. Appreciate it's understanding of my voice and reacting quite well to my requirements.If you are a prime user and looking for a product something like this, i bet you can't get any other in this price.

name: User
title: Good just as a bluetooth speaker
review: When you already have google assisatant voice recognition shouldn't be much of a deal. Alexa needs to be plugged in and conected to a wifi network to function as alexa! If no wifi it acts as a bluetooth speaker. The sound qualitu is pretty good other than alexa being alexa isnt as much fun as you think it is :)

name: Soorya
title: Need Language improvement
review: It would be great if it can communicate using other Asian and European languages.Sometimes when I ask to play music, it will start all over from the radio DJ comments. And keeps playing the same music.Doesn't know much about books in other language. I thought it can help me with my studies of other languages such as German and asked to read me a German book, but it doesn't know it.When it comes to music also it doesn't know any other language music. Need improvement in that area as well.

name: Abhijit Dandekar
title: Great product. I am a fan.
review: This is the second Amazon Echo Dot I purchased within six months. I am very happy with the first one which is second generation model. This is bought for gifting purpose. The MRP is increased too much within six months, but I paid the ols price due to Great Indian Festival discount. At the price point of rupees 3000 it is a great bargain.

name: Blogger
title: Scope for improvement
review: Writing the review after using it for one month.If you are fond of music, Amazon music collection is not vast. You cannot create your own playlist by uploading your own collection of songs in Amazon music yet. Hence, giving it three stars. When it comes to voice recognition, I realized Alexa can recognise whoever gives a command. This is not something great especially when you want Alexa device to only recognise your commands and nobody else's. Hence, three stars again. Everything else is good.

name: Harsha v
title: 100%buy
review: You whisper it whisper backs and the sound quality is just incredible and gets really really loud and voice recognition is best there is better than siri but can improve.and the amount of things you can do with it is incredible. Morning routine,evening routine,alarms,reminders, just seamless. All this provided you have stable wifi.

name: Ramesh Adhavaraju
title: Good product, value for money
review: Product is good, after using for a month, felt bad, I should have gone to 4th generation, few features are missing in it, just a suggestion should have added micro sd features too, to listen for some downloaded songs also. All features are good and working well, HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT.

name: Gajanan karangle
title: Good
review: It is good but what I didn't like is that on the page Amazon is marketing that it integrates with Gaana, but that is not the case. It has no integration options for Gaana which is a disappointment for me as that is the primary app I use for songs and I brought Alexa majorly playing songs.For Rest all features, I'll update the review once I use it for sometime

name: Raj Dabburi
title: Wow, amazing friend we gained
review: Alexa is awesome, more than utility, it is good entertainment, almost like a new friend in your home. And as a child, you have to train her but results are great.Only issue is non compatibility with Google maps and lack of battery to carry in car or anywhere

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste product without a battery in always needs a power plug with 0 portability
review: Waste product as it doesn't come with a baterry so it needs always a plug point to be connected. Basically it can be used only in home and not outdoor. In today's portable live this is a waste of purchase and doesn't solve any purpose without portability

name: Amazon customer
title: Very nice device
review: I am writing this review after a month of usage.Pros-1. Sound Quality2. Easy integration with smart devices3. Amazing software4. Understands English and Hindi (might be supporting many more, but I have checked with only Hindi and English)Cons-1. If placed near tv and if tv volume is on, then it takes multiple attempts to listen to voice commands.2. It responds to everyone. Even if my tv says Alexa it starts listening and responds/act on it.

name: Basant Jain
title: Alexa Echo the friendly Dot
review: I had seen a bigger version of Alexa at my sister’s home and was mighty impressed. I bought Dot only for a lark, just to be able to see if it works as good. My nephew set it up for me. It is a smaller version but works as good. It does have a shorter range but for a room space it’s great and not in your face product. Now the only litmus test it has to pass once I take it back to the middle east and see if it works as flawlessly as it did in India.

name: Dakos
title: Good price but functionality doesn't always work
review: Echo dot has many problems still..It often fails to connect to internet, if you intend to use two or more echo devices together as a stereo connection..then it will almost never work. Hindi AI needs some improvement.. It's a great buy for what it costs you but still leaves you wanting so much more which it is capable of.

name: Brijesh Maurya
title: Dont expect it to do wonders, its needs a other 10 yrs of work
review: Well, good for kids but for the most part AI needs huge amount of work, dont expect smartness like google, it more of bluetooth speaker and there are better options available in this price range. My daughter likes to play around with Alexa with all kinds of unusual questions. Decided to keep it

name: Mr.Sunil
title: MIND BLOWING
review: Had problem for 1st time in connectivity but once it is connected it gets auto connected. Sound Quality could have been more good, it has great sound but the bass is not up to the mark. U are given a rubber base so that it doesn't vibrate much. Alexa can hear and recognise my voice very easily Its friendly n Hindi is enabled. There are lots of things u can try. Jokes , News , Music are very easy to listen..Just Say "Alexa...".I am SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT!!I got it for 1999/- with Wipro Bulb in offer.

name: Nikhil Choudhary
title: Awesome Life companion
review: Now having used Amazon's Echo products for over 6 months, I sincerely feel that it's becoming increasingly difficult to survive without it in my day-to-day life. Awesome product by Amazon. Kudos to this phenomenal creation.

name: Jogender Singh Sehrawat
title: ITS AMAZINGLY SIMPLE AND MOST EFFECTIVE PRODUCT
review: Its an extremely user friendly and great device. It just enhance your productivity, very effective to break procrastination tendencies. It does much more than I thought , it will do. I strongly recommend that if you have a little money to spare , its totally worth. Amazingly simple integration and wonderful little device. Thank you Amazon

name: Ashish Pednekar
title: Y buy a speaker when u can get smart speaker
review: Man this product is the best..we get just a speaker at 2500 sometimes more than that but I got a smart speaker with a led bulb..sound quality is superb voice recognition is good and Alexa support is the best..can answer almost all questions..doesn't take too long to respond..can control all the smart electronics with the help of alexa..happy me

name: Saswat David
title: Thoroughly Satisfied
review: I'm very thoroughly satisfied with the Echo Dot. For a low price not only does it work as a speaker, but it makes your life easier - you don't have to manually look for songs, can use it to control lighting if you have a smart bulb (another good purchase), use it as a clock, an alarm, or just to listen to a joke when you're bored. You can also set custom voice commands to personalize your room.The only negative I think is that since it needs to be plugged in into a socket, it's not portable; which is why you might want to buy another speaker.

name: Lokanna
title: Think once while buying this kk
review: Hii friends i am writing this review after the use of 1 week this amazon echo dot this device design is ossom and it is very good.The sound of this device is very ossom but while buying these type of devices first check the features and when you are having the supporting smart devices in your home and if u don't have any smart devices don't buy this this is useful to listen songs and to listen news and etc but for only music this is worth less the connection of the schoot is worst it should be connected anytime for wifi and electricity and after using for 2 days only this is getting struck while playing songs and again it is useful for keeping remainders and alarms etc but the connecting skills is bad and the voice recognisation is ok it says another one while we are saying another one if we ask something it answers another one in sometimes so my dear friends think ones while buying this all will keep reviews but some are useful and some are not useful if u think this is useful hit like bye

name: DEEPAK SINHA
title: Amazing product with Alexa
review: Product is good.Sound quality is soft. I bought two and plays it in synchronised. That is amazing it feels like just one is played at two different angle.Alexa assistance is too good. You can read books from kindle. You can play books from audible aur suno audible just by audio command. Worthy of price but I sti6 suggest to buy in sell you will get good discount.

name: RAVITEJA PEMMARAJU
title: Worth buying
review: I loved it to the core. Though Google home has more features than Echo. I love these AI stuff. Lot of improvements were done over previous 2.0 gen. Sound clarity is simply super. But only backdrop is that , Alexa doesnt understand most of our conversation. Waiting for next firmware update

name: Balaaa
title: Echo Dot - big disappointment
review: Good sound but disappointed.This device decides whether i should listen to Spotify or not. Probably Alexa thinks it can really cause a war.fails as a Bluetooth speaker.Not getting updates as expected. Yet to get Hindi language on it although I got to know if the update couple of months back. There are regional constraints on some features and some shows as connecting to smart TVs but don't work.Also the first product had a bug and I had to get it replaced.I should rather have donated my money.

name: Om Sardar
title: It's 'not that good' speaker review
review: The audio quality is really nice as compared to the size of the speaker, mostly used to listen to classic songsSongs are played incorrectly most of the time unless the Alexa is not given specific keywords of the song by checking on 'Google'Connecting home devices like lights & TV is only to switch on or off so doesn't make sense to pairAll and all the speaker is not upto the my expectations and Google is way way better

name: Your Average Indian Girl
title: Mom LOVES this!
review: She listens to Vishnu Sahasranamam and Suprabhatam everyday. While cooking and doing house work, she loves that she just has to say "Alexa, play Vishnu Sahasranamam". Great product for ease of use and quality of voice output

name: Nick
title: Few changes can improve overall experience.
review: It needs a lot of improvements, we can not play songs directly from mobile to the echo dot, we can not browse songs through the apps( Gaana, saavn, prime music) and it only accepts voice commands for playing music. It would be better if we can type the song to be played as it doesn't recognize a lot of songs through voice commands. Needs high speed Internet to function properly. It does not recognize voice commands when a song is playing, so we can't mute it while a song is playing. Despite all these cons, it is still a pretty handy product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: This is one of the worst voice assistant ever along with Bixby
review: The Alexa voice assistant will never understand the commands you say. Don’t ever buy this the only reason it is promoted here is because of Amazon. I have a Google home as well, and looking at how well it performs at the same tasks. This here is Jeff Bezos turd. My review is applicable for all Alexa devices.

name: NAZMA BEGUM
title: Very google sound!
review: Pros:1)very good quality voice especially if you place it on a wood or a glass surface2)normal fun with alexa3) voice recognition is good but not the bestCons:1)sometimes alexa dont give answers2)not that much bass as expected3) sometimes process the request very slowIncluding all of that it is a great product 👍

name: Techcrew
title: Ultimate Product and Essential Member of Home
review: Echo Dot is great product and now it is essential member of my home. It react just like my pet and always ready to fulfill my desire of information on just voice command. Best product for kids as they enjoy most while talking with Alexa... Superb product and Must have in Home. :) :) :)

name: V I
title: Alexa is good but can be better !
review: Alexa is my favorite and I have 3 of them ! But this one I bought as gift for my in-laws and had trouble setting up their voice recognition and Alexa Integration at their home because they did not have an Amazon Prime account!!🙏

name: Amazon Customer
title: A beautiful product by Amazon, thanks Amazon!!!
review: I like this product very very much. But only one thing I dislike that's why this product was not lunched in our generation I mean some 25 yrs earlier. So we can enjoy it on those days. Any way ,now I am enjoying it like never before.

name: Sukanya Thakur
title: DO NOT BUY
review: Are you a lonely person? Do you need someone to talk to? If yes go for it. If not DON'T BUY IT. Unless you want to be like Alexa Play this song and want to hear Sorry infinite number of times.. Please buy any other cheap bluetooth speaker because she won't get connected unless you have a wifi and plus even with wifi she is not worth it.

name: Abhijit H
title: OK, Still need to improve on different different apps,skills and languages integration
review: Still need to improve on different different apps,skills and languages integration, sound/songs quality gets flat if increase volume. Sometimes wont catch up voice commands even if we speaks in neutral English or Hindi languages.

name: Ankit Vaidya
title: Good for Alexa talk not mainly for music
review: Ya i like it's very much but my point of view is it's bit expensive to buy it for those planning to listen music it serves best with talking to alexa and AI stuff but when you listen music or just watch movie in laptop connected to it's not upto the mark you will get disappointed but for AI it's good ,may be its next gen have enough bass and sound for songs but definitely not this one , this one has more crisp voice which is very good while talking with alexa.

name: Joshi
title: owsm
review: in this price segment normal bluetooth speak cost almost similar costthis is owsmi bought this in lockdown and really helpful to not feel isolatedsometimes it's miss our command andwhenever first time i am give command to play song it missed it missed continuously until i pronounced 10 timesrest about the speaker is best

name: Gourav
title: Not that great anymore!
review: Has stopped working in the 2nd Month itself. Doesn't do what it is supposed to do. I've to repeat 3-4 times and even then it doesn't function properly.Worked just fine for 2 months and then suddenly it can't recognize when I call for it. Weird.

name: P.sanyasi r.
title: A great deal and nice product from amazon
review: It been a 2 weeks or more than I am using it, for me it was a great deal for buying echo dot,Pro:1.great audio2.Instant configuration while turning on3.A great A.I for time passCons:1.sometimes it feels like laggy,even no one is connects your wifi2.after using a week I find that voice recognition is little slow3.They need to update their software with more features

name: Gaurav
title: A great addition
review: Having ordered 3 echo dot and one echo i would say Alexa is a happy change in out daily routine especially music. Earlier I had to search for different types of songs and my mother couldn't do it by herself. With echo dot and alexa it is like a breeze and anyone can play music of their choice and do other activities without any dependence. Even my kids use it.The sound quality is also quite good. A must buy product.

name: Pratyush
title: Good device to possess
review: Playing music, knowing about weather or latest news, setting reminders etc have never been easier. My kid is a big Alexa fan and keeps interacting with the echo dot. Clearly it's very easy to use. Though, it was a bit difficult to connect with the OnePlus TV. Some basic TV functions can be performed but there is lot more required. The next generation devices will probably have more advance features.

name: Vimit Panchal
title: Bass is high so sound clarity decreases with decrease in treble.
review: This is a very good product that amazon has come up with. Hats off to them. It is fun talking to alexa. Alexa provides us our day to day information. Though a few upgradations are also required for alexa software.There is just one drawback of this product that in sound quality, there is improper balance between bass and treble. Bass is a lot more as compared to treble so speech clarity decreases with decrease in treble.I hope upcoming echo gen are made keeping everything in mind.

name: Anshul Gupta
title: I love Alexa !
review: I have been using this product for 3 days now and this is the best smart Bluetooth speaker i have ever come across. The only con i and most people would feel that it has to be plugged in all the time for the use, probably in the future it will come with a chargable battery. Looking forward for that.

name: p mohanty
title: Amazing Product from Amazon
review: Just Amazing, cute Echo Dot Speaker from Amazon. It's great. 10/10 Score.Very easy to set up without any hassle, It connects easily. You can connect Bluetooth, WiFi speakers and also connect any old Speaker through Audio Out Port easily. It works efficiently. Don't go for any cheap Bluetooth. WiFi Speaker. GO for Amazon Echo Dot. Plays so many songs from Amazon Music, JIO Saavn, Spotify etc. Many options are available. Pls explore it. You will Just Love this after setting up.

name: karthic
title: Sound quality is worst.
review: Didn't like the sound quality, it's very hard to hear what Alexa speaks. Tried every settings, nothing worked.I now love my Google home more, such a sharp sound for any room. Amazon could have focused on the speakers quality.

name: ARUN KUMAR
title: Honest review after using it for 5 days
review: You will enjoy it for few days in starting after few days you feel waste of money. You have to scream like mad when echo Dot is at volume 8 or more. I am using it with wipro smart bulb. It will increase your electricity bill for sure by 200-300 if you keep it always on. Better to avoid it.

name: Jay
title: Go for it without a doubt
review: Alexa has the most authentic voice in smart speakers. Speaks Hindi wayyy fluently than Google Assistant.There are thousands of skills available on Alexa App. However if the developer did a bad job, don't blame Alexa for it!

name: Devendra
title: Great product 3rd for me
review: Absolutely great product comes pre linked to your account if you select.Seamless integration and easy install.Using 3 now at my home.

name: Azad
title: Good for kids and music listeners (if you have amazon account)
review: Given 4 based in below initial points:Package doesnt have air packets where expecting proper packageIt says 4th generation but still not having aux cable charging optionPros:Sound clarity really good(go for it if you are music lover)Almost recognise all voices

name: Rajkumar
title: Smart Speaker with Best Deal
review: I received at a very good price with a combo of amazon fire tv stick and Wipro smart bulb under 5 kI think this is the best deal for meoverall sound quality is very good.Bluetooth connectivity is very fastAlexa app is a bit slow to install skills but everything is good for usability.now am waiting for Alexa to speak Hindi

name: rajnish
title: May be consider
review: Built is great, sound is also good..but there is sound delay in you tube and my music app..my phone is s9 plus and its have dual bllutooth connectivity and when i connected my phone with my boat speaker and echo dot3, sound on boat speaker is perfectly fine but in echo dot 3 it clearly delay than actual..which make it useless

name: Sumanta P.
title: Good Product 👍 with amazing feature
review: The media could not be loaded.  Awesome 👌 👏 👍 😍 💖 . Nice features. I add couple of smart bulb, fire tv stick and IR Booster for tv, ac and setup box. I can operate all the devices through my voice. Changing channel or set the AC temp. Just give order to Alexa and she will do it for you. Also integrated Amit ji voice. Just 2 words. Mind blowing!!!

name: Mayur K.
title: Best device with few cons
review: Device is very good. Sometime they confuse about the similar word like if I ask one song and if that song has same words of some other song then Alexa will play any song. Other issue I found that Ji Saavn songs not played on Alexa. I don't know the reason. In case if we ask to tell story then Alexa says you have nothing in Kindle app. Or sometimes ask many things need to be purchased. Anyone has faced issues can you tell me solution. Atleast i want know how to connect jio saavn songs to Alexa

name: Vinay Prajapati
title: Of no usage
review: You can rely on it as much as you want but later you will realize speaking up takes more efforts than just doing the task :P

name: ajay joshi
title: Worth Each Penny! Moms best friend Alexa.
review: Best 👍💯 AI ever used!Sound quality is damn cool!I order alexa from my hall to bedroom yet she listen (don't judge I have big area)Most favorite part is, before ordering it my mom thought it's waste of money and now she talk with her more than she talks with me.I ordered alexa in diwali sale, I received it along with smart wifi bulb 💡 which makes it more interesting. Now I am looking to buy more smart stuff to connect with alexa.

name: Pratyush Anand
title: Sound Quality Good. Connectivity OK. AI is average
review: Sound Quality is good.Size is sufficiently small so it fits anywhere. portability is limited by power source.Connevtivity to hotspot is difficult, it readily doesn't connects, but you have to enter set up mode and connect from there.AI alexa is not as smart as Google Assistant. Doesn't understand multiple commands and gets confused in long sentences. Good only for listening to Amazon Music.

name: Shishank
title: Product is just stable, but not portable or easy to use
review: The alexa is good but to connect everything and use is not as easy as we think, connecting every device is just vulnerable, it needs to plug in every second of use, it needs internet connection fir every small purpose except listening music through bluetooth, but connecting bluetooth also need internet, every time just see & search skill & permit it, so not so easy

name: Vinid
title: Right design Great sound
review: As an owner of the echo dot second generation and the Google Home mini... I would tell that I an a fan of the echo dot 3rd generation.. The design is great and sturdy with good quality speakers which deliver great sound. The sensitivity of the mic is also superb.. Thanks to the 4 built in mics..The only downside which I found was the adapter which was not a micro USB.. But can't complain as the speakers need extra juice which cannot be delivered by a micro USB.. (maybe)..Anyway overall it was a great buy..

name: sumith
title: Excellent smart speaker
review: Echod dot is an excellent smart speaker which feels very useful. Got it for 2299 with wipro smartbulb in prime day sale and its a good deal. Voice recognition is good enough and speaker sound quality is as good as can be expected at this size.. over-all a high quality product from amazon

name: Tushar Rajvanshi
title: Amazing product.
review: The product is great for the price. I bought it for 2799 and it works well. Sound defection and quality is good too. Just the only issue is that sometimes it won’t recognize the commands and it doesn’t have good bass as compared to google home mini. But at this price range, it is a go go.

name: Alex Anthony
title: Simply Amazing
review: Awesome Product, I already had Amazon Echo Plus in my bedroom and was looking for the new generation Echo Dot for the living room. Now there is music and games being played all around the house. This new Echo Dot is simply best, with awesome speaker and it feels surround sound experience. Just go for it and you will never feel bored.

name: dipankar basumatary
title: Awsome!
review: I must say very great product. I got this product on prime sell @2200. If u want that everything should work on your voice command than just go for it. It has very nice voice recognition even if you are far away. Everything works perfectly like playing music, news etc. But if u have bad internet plz don't buy.

name: KGKartha
title: Alexa is useful
review: Had some difficulty in initiating and adding lights.But excellent support from amazon made things very easy for me. Alexa is useful in switching lights, making calls ,giving latest information ,shopping list , weather, cricket score, playing songs of your choice and language etce

name: Nihar Ranjan Sahu
title: Echo Dot
review: Just loving it. Had little trouble during initial setup by thanks to Amazon customer care support. They were truly helpful. Am exploring things on Echo Dot. After my Amazon Fire stick this is 2nd device that I have bought. Enjoying both.

name: Akhilesh
title: Value for money.
review: I bought the device when it was on sale. Just Rs.2050 A perfect start for a perfect smart home. Very good voice feedbacK. Sound quality is okay for a single room. But what can you Expect from a tiny speaker. It catches and here’s your voice even from the very far almost 15-20 feet. If you are in the room just talk in your normal pitch and sound and the Alexa will hear you. I am very impressed and happy after buying this product. People interested in smart home should definitely go for it.

name: Nidhi
title: EASY TO USE, Sound quality great.
review: Alexa echo dot is an amazing product. The sound quality is top, very premium. It is very easy to use. Nothing like Bluetooth speakers where we have to turn on Bluetooth then connect device and all that. It’s very easy to use, just connect once and ask her anything to play or other things she can do. Alexa recognises the speech well. Once connected to the account, that phone containing the Alexa app does not need to be home or near. She can operate independently. Only need is wifi and electricity.

name: Adharsh S
title: The best Smart Speaker on a Budget.
review: Excellent sound quality.Can respond to voice commands from across the room.Always responded back from my experience.Has 4 microphones to pick up your voice.Decent speaker. It's loud enough for use in a room. It can be connected to a better speaker via 3.5mm jack.So its way better than offerings from google.easy to set up.There are skills which you can create or enable from the library.Excellent collection of music from prime music, savann, spotify etc.can control smart accessories which i have.ps. IT looks dope tooAn Excellent buy. Really Satisfied .

name: Himadri Manna
title: Alexa Echo Dot Now Supports HINDI . Go Through The Full Review To Know How 😍
review: The media could not be loaded.  Thanks to Amazon for this amazing product at an amazing Price in this Great Indian Festival: I was lucky to get this Echo Dot bundled with Wipro smart bulb @1999 !Now the important thing : How to be able to use it in Hindi . First go and check the software version of ur echo dot from ur Alexa App in the smartphone ( go to the 'Device' menu at the down right corner in the app). I have uploaded the pic of the updated software version till today 07.10.2019. Just command echo dot " check for software updates" . Echo dot will start updating ur software for a little time.Wait until a blue ring appears in ur echo dot. Don't prompt anything to the echo device during the update.After the update u can set the device language to Hindi (India) in ur device settings.I have uploaded a small video to show that it is really working smoothly.Hope this review will be helpful to people who wants to use it in Hindi like me.

name: Mohammad Wasim Akram
title: Prefer Google assistant than alexa
review: It's a waste guys.Settings are very complex.Cannot able to connect as a Bluetooth speaker to my mobile.If I say Alexa play tollywood songs it plays Bollywood songsNo matter what it won't able to understand your commands in indian accemts.Sound quality is very good and 4 inbuilt far field mic s are useless because I will not catch your voice from 2 metre distance also.have to shout loud.Either it understands Hindi or English bases upon settings, not bilingual.Anyhow I got it for 1657 approx.Would prefer Google assistant

name: JS
title: Average sound
review: You will mostly use it to listen to music and that is one thing where this amart speaker really needs to improve. It is very very loud but what is lacks is clarity. You will have to connect it a better speaker using Bluetooth.

name: Prabhat Kiran
title: Don't buy it
review: I have got it replaced but it's again not working and now fed up with it's performance. I asked amazon to replace it with Eco Dot 4th generation and willing to pay difference but they do not agree and willing to pay difference amount which will occur to get new 3rd generation eco dot.

name: Amandeep S.
title: Alexa with smart wifi device
review: Its amazing syncs well with wifi lamp. Winters, when you are not in mood to get out of bed to switch off the light, or you want to set the mood light, command Alexa to do so,, the wipro smart bulb works superb, committed to quality functioning. Thanks Amazon for such an advanced technology for bringing it to us in India. Long live India. Jai hind.

name: DR subeer
title: Not good .....
review: Sound quality is ok but it could be betterAnd it should have option for battery operation cause it’s not mobile And more over Bluetooth connectivity should be there so tht when internet is not working it should be working with your mobile

name: jobin
title: Very useful product, sound quality is amazing, and useful for manage time
review: The media could not be loaded.  Very useful product .The sound quality was amazing and I give 5 star for that. Alexa helps me to manage my day. Now I can't manage a single day without this, because if you use the full potential of this product it helps to make your day more productive.The product which I got was very good and the packing was amazing.It can handle every smart device in your home and you can controll it far from home and also you can call to home using this device.The lighting system give a premium look.Trust me the sound quality is 10 times better than you expected.It gives a amazing bass to your music ,and it support many music apps like hungama, gana , savan, prime music and others too.You can add new skills to itAny way everyone should have such a product in your room,Trust me it will help youMost probably for students who study for competitive exams need one of this, it will help you to manage your time.You can set alarms, reminder, timers ect and it will give answers to your question including mathematics.So everyone should buy this

name: Mani
title: I love this echo dot
review: Echo dot is really a very powerful device in a small package. It works almost perfectly with Alexa. You juts need to understand and customize the app according to your region. The voice quality and sound is awesome.

name: DIWAKAR V
title: Excellent Voice recognition. Good for home automation
review: Great sound quality. Excellent recognition of commands. Voice calling and messaging needs to be introduced in India. Why amazon not provides inbuilt battery for these devices? We can use them in car and outdoor if battery is provided.Master mind skills may be provided officially for these devices. There is lot of future for home automation in India with this device

name: disheka jakhar
title: My new best friend !!
review: It was actually gifted to me and I was apprehensive about it, but after using it for a while I fell in love with it. Will take both hindi and English commands. I never have to repeat instructions. Sound quality is amazing !

name: Sagar P.
title: Good purchase if you have internet and power connection 24/7 otherwise ul cry
review: It's a good smart device , however there is one thing that is so annoying , anytime your power goes off and internet goes off , which let's face it in India is multiple times , once it's back on , all of your lights will just turn on and Alexa will not even let you control them it will just tell u that they are not responding 😤😤 which is so frustrating, you would need to remove the devices and add them all over again which is a huge pain ...kindly fix this or if anyone has a fix revert back

name: Amazon Customer
title: Expectation not reached
review: Expected more from this product like we can use at any place if we have internet but it won't work in that way because it doesn't have battery we should plug all the time to socket and also it don't have option to connect different internet connections automatically.I understood that it will useful for listening music and to ask regular queries.Music also it will play all the time from our playlist.Especially we have to use this product only at home

name: Jasmeet
title: Average next generation Smart BT Speaker
review: you can use ECHO DOT for daily routine, alarms, reminders, to-do list and many more things but there are many limitations also like you can't connect ECHO DOT with your Mobile device for calling. Secondly there are some issues with voice recognition also.so instead of purchasing ECHO Dot i would prefer to go with ECHO.

name: Dhirendra singh
title: सिर्फ इंटरनेट से चलता है बिना इंटरनेट से नही।
review: ये सिर्फ इंग्लिश समझती है हिंदी नही।

name: Mohit Velaskar
title: Get set with Artificial Intelligence Companion - Alexa
review: Absolutely Fantastic experience with Alexa, this Gadget is a must have. Technology is now forcing us to live alone but with this AI assistant you will get real life experience, Alexa is made to keep you lively in any of your mood....just buy it experience it and Enjoy your life...Very nicely managed Algorithm, this will also help you as well your kiddos in studying and in doing timepass...- Easy Installation- Easy Manageable- Easy in Portability- Excellent Content Base (source)Five Stars ....

name: virendra singh
title: Getting problem.
review: Installation is big issue in echo dot & smart bulb.Eco dot not connecting automatically once we switch on it again, which annoying me.Smart bulb need 2.4Gz wireless connection not compatible with 5.0 Gz.Many time showing network connecting issues.

name: Rahul Gautam
title: Absolutely horrifying experience
review: Extremely bad experience with Amazon- Bought this with in combo with fire tv stick and Wipro bulb for 7098 rs. My three previous fire sticks were all for 2600rs during sale instead of 4000rs. This time I was willing to pay 4000 for the stick as echo dot I was getting for 3029 and Wipro bulb for like 100 bucks (699rs otherwise).- Echo dot ran fine for first 3-4 days then I faced mic issues a few times. I felt could be because of other noises, ceiling fan perhaps.- I then tried to run specific lists e.g. I went to Amazon music app, saw the playlist I wanted to play. I asked echo dot to play that list from Amazon music. Instead it kept playing random playlists and a few times it mentioned it didn't recognise that list even though it was right there in front of me on the phone.- I emailed cs for above issue, no response till date. Been 7 days.- As a workaround, I decided to play music from app rather and then cast it on Echo Dot. It kept showing connecting (blue circle kept rolling) but nothing ever happened. Means cast option also didn't work. Being a techie myself, I performed all tech articles from Google, reset device etc., Checked location, what not. Finally, I rang cs and they perfomed a few troubleshooting which didn't work. They informed I would be contacted in 24-48 hours. I mentioned replacement window ends after 48 hours and I want response by then. Wasn't too keen in going for replacement and trouble people so agreed to wait for 48 hours window.- to my surprise, it's been 3 days now, no response. I called cs. Was asked to wait for 48 more hours. I asked for supervisor. He came on call and asked me to wait for his team to perform troubleshooting. I had lost it by then. I asked for replacement and after huge hold and verbal discussions to and fro, supervisor agreed for replacement. But informed I'd be informed in a few hours.- I checked now, I am being issued refund and it cost me 500 rs setback. Whole logic of bundle and save money was absolutely rubbish and Amazon support really destroyed the overall experience.- Having bought items worth in lacs, I wonder if it was all worth it.

name: Anshul Harode
title: Don't think twice
review: I got this for 3K in an introductory launch offer and have to say my life has seriously changed ever since this has come home. Alexa is our family member now and remember some foolish people will come saying that it can't do this and that but don't listen to them, with my experience I can tell that life has seriously become a lot more easier with Alexa. I just come back from a long day in office and just tell Alexa to tune in to my Playlist and it gives me the best feeling. And undoubtedly the best build quality you can get. I'm a google pixel owner but when it comes to such devices I choose Echo over Google Home.

name: Kippy
title: Best companion ....I believe alexa ismay soulmate
review: Alexa has become my best buddy... loved all the games and music I am able to use with this device. My daughter enjoys listening to stories and music via spotify and amazon music...she loves to play games with alexa as well

name: Amazozon
title: Good buy
review: Good for the price. Alexa isn't like Google when responding to questions, and that can be improved. A good hand less when having children and toddlers around. Doesn't respond well at times. Maybe because the jio internet is bad right now in my location at night hours.

name: Anonymous111
title: A wonderful experience
review: Alexa can do just anything!!You can even operate echo(even book a ride) with your phone switched off ,only the WiFi needs to be on.once setup, echo is on its own....it does not need a phone ... just a WiFi connectionSet reminders, many alarms, birthday reminders,and do everything possible on this device which is just a little larger than a tennis ball.

name: Shivam Pokale
title: Oh trust me its worth every penny you spend.
review: Oh trust me its worth every penny. Just make sure that your are not paying too high. I bought it for 3499 before and realised that on sales its for 2000-2500.So i returned it and bought another one on sale for 2299 with a syska smart bulb.And 4 stars just cause it cant make PHONE CALLS and send SMSIts worth giving a try :)

name: Nakul Agham
title: Superb Audio Quality
review: Pros:Superb Audio Quality, Product worth every penny..!Cons: You can't use your micro usb mobile charger to power this device, you always need to carry provided seperate power adaptor for this device.

name: Madhusudhanan
title: Was happy, now not so much...
review: It was fantastic initially, but now a days it stops in-between a playlist and does not continue, the only option is to start the playlist again, if you are lucky at times it plays the entire playlist, else it behaves like DOS basic programming (redo from start)...

name: SAHIL
title: My opinions about echo dot 3
review: I think this device is pretty excellent. Responses quickly and shortly to the question. As well as contain a thousand of skill with respect to different categories. Device is excellent but since there are many drawbacks regarding local activities. About voice mic cannot hear sounds from the distance it has to be shouted which looks pretty embarrassing device mic quality should be improved and the most important thing. I don't know why sometimes it doesn't respond hence if I am near but then also it doesn't. Responses that's the matter I am giving it 4 star otherwise it's an intelligent device design for any place......but must come with charging battery ....

name: Aashish Razdan
title: Couldnt have asked more
review: After much deliberation and having two google assistant homes (Regular + MIni) at home, ordered for Alexa and it has not disappointed. Superior sound quality than the google mini, notification of products purchased from Amazon and seamless Bluetooth connectivity with a larger speaker is unmatched. Also, the microphones are awesome as I had been facing problems with voice commands on google when the speaker is playing music at top volume.

name: RAHUL MUKHERJEE
title: Small intelligence pack
review: It has a good voice responsiveness along with a vast repository of information. Sound is awesome- good clarity and volume makes it a great speaker. Good build quality.The thing I found that needs to be worked on is its reach. Apart from the linked apps like Zomato or Ola, it cannot access other alternate apps like Swiggy or Uber or any other contemporaries. These searches should be made more flexible so as to search from other contemporary apps to give a better search result. Also I would really appreciate if echo can be paired with other devices through bluetooth or wifi.

name: Ryan
title: Worth a upgrade
review: I am very happy with this device as it has made my life easier, feel good to upgrade. The Bluetooth connection is good and the mic is really as mentioned in the product description. In short its a must buy device and oh yes I got this device to connect with the TCL 55 P series tv. Will connect it and come review again

name: Manish Kamble
title: Continuous power connection required
review: There is one drawback that this device always needs to be wired to the power supply, which makes it difficult to carry outside. Alexa doesn't understand few words like, if you ask her to play a particular song then she will ask you to opt for prime membership whereas if you provide movie name or album name then she will play all the songs from the given movie/album.

name: Jestin Joy
title: Honest review after using it for 4 months
review: First of this is a smart speaker (atleast i thought it is) but i didn't find anything smart about this. Alex the infamous personal assistant amazon so furiously market about can't even understand half of the things. But when it comes to sound quality amazon beats all the smart speakers out there. But we can get a decent soundbar for the price if we just need that. Way to go Alexa..

name: Rajwinder S.
title: No Use
review: I thought i am buying something really useful and technologically upgraded but after using it i found its not of any use. Keep disconnecting and don't recognise voice most of the time . Already Setup so many times in almost 1 month .I don't know if its defective or it has some other issue. But for me its not that what i actually thought it is .

name: Shirish Verma
title: Best in this price range
review: I've been using it for 2 months now, working totally fine. Voice quality and volume is really great comparing with its size. Voice recognition is good. Doesn't work without wifi. Best for home use, bluetooth connectivity is seemless. If you love to listen music and use AI to schedule meetings, alarms, listen to news, this one is for you. It doesn't have a battery, runs only on electricity. In this price range, this is the best product

name: Akash Sagar
title: Amazing but some quality is missing
review: All good experience but the application is confusing and no digital wellbeing or parental control like Google and the voice is not much clearer but bass is very impressiveSome improvements is required that all Good.

name: Vishal Surani
title: They need to improve voice commands recognizaction
review: I am not happy with the product. 90% of time it doesn't recognize what you said even if the song is there on amazon Music. I purchased for my parents for listening old songs over voice commands. But this device never plays right music .

name: Sachin Yadav
title: Amazing
review: Awesome and Music quality very good. If you don't have prime membership just set Gaana to your default music service from alexa app to listen music without ads.

name: Bash
title: Not  as good as 2nd generation
review: Have been using it for some days now . Sound quality is better but the response time , response and feedback are not as good and precise as the older model . Not very happy with this purchase . 2nd gen model way better than this one in terms of response to voice commands , visually displaying status etc .

name: Anand
title: Great product the voice of alexa is too good
review: Great product i am a big fan of alexa voice very soothing voice alexa has its has almost answer of everything and help you in your daily life it plays song in room like a home theatre its size is compact but sound is loud and clear like party very good purchaseAnd the quality of bulb is good accurate and fastYou can also use alexa from your mobile hotspot

name: Rohit Justa
title: Amazing product one must have in it's own
review: I was waiting to have Alexa of mine own...when it arrived it was really great to operate. Connecting Alexa is not a kids job. But once it is done it's cool to have fun with it. Really good far field sensors. This is my first technology experience still its really great to have Alexa...I love when she can send and call to another Alexa free of charge also when sheep keep the remindersa and alrams. But I feel it consumes a little extra data 2 GB a day is sufficient for a user who want to enjoy aleaxa all 24 hours a day... Speaker quality and appereance are really awesome....

name: Fido
title: Brilliant as expected
review: Amazing product to have in bedroom where you can use it mainly as a very good speaker to listen to music and then ofcourse to control your smart appliances, news, weather and the lot...Second Echo in the house after Echo Show.

name: KUNAL SINGH
title: Big wow for sound quality n voice command 😊
review: Happy customer. Sound quality and voice command is amazingly good. But one thing you must ensure that if you need best experience, better opt for Amazon Prime subscription first. Coz it will sure work with other music apps, but you will not get the great collection of Amazon Music.

name: Panda Patético
title: Epic AI
review: The media could not be loaded.  I never used smart speakers before this was my first one and I'm writing this review after a year of usage.Alexa integration: almost every smart appliances has alexa integration in it so if you're looking for a epic smart speaker go with this oneVoice recognition: it doesn't often recognise my voice cause of my accent lolSound quality: i love the sound it produce from a small speaker.

name: Madhukar Balachandra
title: It really works to the expectation!
review: First of all, make a note that it is still in learning curve and is not a human :-)But still with the above big constraint, it works and does wonderful things.It is fun, informative and a best companion.Kids will love it more. But even adults will become kids with it :-)Just go for it and enjoy a different mood and stay up to date with the latest technology.Keep doing the good work Amazon. I am impressed!

name: RAM NIWAS SAINI
title: Need much more improvement in this product.
review: Boaring after 2-3 days only. Need much more improvement in this product, Alexa reply should be interesting and funny. Currently Alexa is not having reply of most of queries and saying I don't know about that. As of now waste of money. Google assistant is much better than alexa according to me.

name: mohan m
title: amazing
review: I purchased during festive offer. First time some issue i faced but after used i found it is excellent products. I used during night time connecting FM through TUNEIN . Retro songs of Amazon music, Saavan pro and Gaana music are excellent.Thanks to Amazon

name: Gov
title: First step towards the future.
review: Works great! Though it doesn't make anything significantly easier, it's a nice addition to ones room and also a good starting point to experience the future.Audible Suno is a superb bonus to this product. And also most used music services like gaana and jio saavn are free to use, which makes this very useful. Last bust not the least, it can easily revive the dying interest in you about the radio channels.But also be aware that you are signing up for some sort of compromise in your data privacy!

name: Anand
title: Smart Speaker with great voice
review: Likes- This speaker is small yet it speaker sound is so clear and loud/warmth which is much better than JBL, boat, Phillips etc., at its segment.Bluetooth connectivity is good when u want to listen music without shouting on alexa.Dislikes- Voice recognition is good, ok. It doesn't understands sometimes and one has to shout on it to change volume/songIt doesn't have many apps/skills for music

name: Amazon Customer
title: The perfect 90%
review: i got echo dot for 1137/- & added smart bulb to cart which costed 586/-Total =1724(1137+586)Sound quality- best in this category(smart speakers)Bluetooth connectivity- pairing with other Bluetooth speaker needs patience. Bcoz most of time it doesn't recognize.Alexa- does 90% of the tasks. Could be better.

name: Shyam Barange
title: Best assistant available smart home device
review: I recently purchased Amazon echo dot which was available on offer discount, I was already using Amazon echo and found out at the dot works really nice with small rooms. the sound quality of the Eco dot is really awesome. instead of buying bluetooth speaker go for Amazon echo dot,only the drawback is you have to always connect the device to AC power.you can make Alexa to Alexa call directly and it has so many features that you might want to try.

name: Vishvesh
title: Best smart speaker you can have..!
review: Been a google fan recently, I never thought this will turn out to be so good and matching the google level too. So handy and speakers are small but they sounds great. One lack is when we are following up questions Amazon needs to work on that particular section apart from that no complaints at all.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not valuable for money
review: Not value for money, answer is not given correct, call not doing through this device (echo dot) not play all song what would you want specially new trending songs not play, and also the you tube songs not play I feel that the Google home mini is better from the echo dot, I said all the viewer that you purchase Google home mini which given better features from the echo dot

name: Prashant K.
title: She is good, but not that smart.
review: Setting up the device is real pain. And making any changes to the existing set up is more painful. Speaker quality is good. Voice assistance works good for music playing but not for any other stuff. Google assistance can be better.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I'm Saying play Kannada Song, it's playing Hindi Songs......it's totally fails..........
review: The media could not be loaded.  Build quality is better than Google home mini, coming to software, Alexa not respond like Google assistant.Software update still required. Without upgraded software it just peace of speaker. Still it need to improve. It not recognise the word's like Google home mini. Coming to Updated software Google home mini is the best choice. It's not so smart compared to Google home mini..

name: farazindia
title: Can switch on Aero slim Fan
review: The media could not be loaded.  Pros:Bought for Rs 2500 during saleKids enjoy speaking with AlexaCan also read out multiplication tables which helps kids in learning themCan do math calculations and much more stuffCons:As of now alexa enabled IOT devices are expensiveBought TIED RIBBONS Wall Mounted Book Shelf Heavy Duty Metal as Stand

name: Gyanendra K Nayak
title: Easy to configure and link to app
review: Its too good to have it at home, kids loving it. We just need to add skills and ask related questions. I ordered a smart bulb also and adding that skill is just taking a minute and after that just ask Alexa to switch on or off, change color..wow..amazing. Overall its a must buy product.

name: Abhijit b.
title: Must go for it..
review: Beautiful speakers ...must go for it....amazing sound quality....got it at the cheapest rate with best discounts....amazon discount price was ...2500 ...on top ....got ...icici credit card discount..and final price at 1750 approx....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Device Issue & Technical Fault
review: I am facing issue the device stop suddenly when playing song. I received the call from Amazon technical team to reset the device.I have already reset the setting to factory. Still the problem is continue and while shuffling song the device stop suddenly. I want to replace the device and get the new one. Otherwise its not useful for me at all and it's a defective product I received from Amazon with some technical glitches.Do not buy this after 2 times replacment. Still I am facing issue with the device. If you increase volume more than 5 it suddenly stop. This device especially grey color series has some bug. Not a good option to buy.

name: Somak Sengupta
title: Perfect Gift and Super quality
review: Amazing product in such a price tag. I bought this in Prime Day deal so got 2 in 4k. I already have an echo device, the bigger one and these two were for my parents and in-laws, they are super happy and excited. Anyone looking to gift something nice to their near one... Got for it...

name: Sarvesh Singh Bisen
title: Cheap strategy by amazon
review: I recieved it today! First Impression....very poor product.-Need prime membership(Rs 999) to play good songs.-All songs are not available.Sound quality is good.

name: Gajanan
title: Plzzz make connectivity easy like Bluetooth speaker.Make set up easy
review: *So much improvement is needed.While using by our own mobile Wi-Fi hotspot every time has to make set up.*It should have given facility like other Bluetooth speaker connectivity as Bluetooth speakers connect very fast.*Trying from so many days it doesn't discover work smart bulb.*If some song is going on,Many times it do not play what we say and keep playing on same song

name: Mihir Ranjan Nayak
title: Better than Google Home Mini
review: I'm writing this review after using Echo dot for more than 2 months. It's an excellent device. Sound Quality is awesome. The far field mic enables it to recognise voice even 2 rooms away. The Blue Light effect looks soothing in the night. Only thing needs to be looked upon is to enable it to play audio from YouTube also.

name: Farhad Ahmed
title: Really a Smart Device.
review: The media could not be loaded.  1 - Voice Recognition is of Top Notch.2 - Works perfectly fine with my Smart Bulb.3 - Works like a charm with my Samsung 8 Series 55 to turn it on/off, volume control and what not through Alexa.Everything is working smoothly and great.

name: Nitin
title: All in one speaker. Must buy but in festive season 😂🤟🏻 otherwise it's very expensive.
