review: Product is just stunning...... Amazon did a great job to make this smart speaker affordable in this festive season..... Quality is just superb..... Sound quality is like home theatre.....mic quality is excellent...... catches voice form far distance... Lovely product.......And one more thing what to say about Alexa.... She's very friendly 😂😂😂😂and smart she gives answers in a very funny way.... whether you ask questions in Hindi 😂😂😂....Love this product ❤️❤️❤️❤️

name: Vijay B.
title: Awesome
review: Superb The new and improve ALEXA.3U can play All India Redio, Redio Mirchi 98.3 Fm, FM Gold, Vividh Bharti & Much Much More But By Default Those Feature's is not enabled but we can enable all those feature's and more..I Just Love It..

name: Sugata Bag
title: Good can be better with upgradation of Alexa software
review: Enjoying every bit of it.Sound decent, little overdose of bass.It can pick up the voice commands from any corner of a big hall, even from other rooms also.Alexa app, however, needs a revamp. There must a way to search Amazon music library within it. Sometimes Echo dot cannot find the song or an album even it is there in the AmMusic.Lastly, the casting option to Alexa enabled device from AmMusic doesn't work, it failed to detect the device even if both are linked to same account.

name: Santosh Prajapati
title: Alexa unable to identify songs requested, looking for a replacement if possible
review: Alexa is unable to identify songs placed to it and most of the time get a negative response of unavailability of our request. Seems to be a waste product for me.Looking for a replacement of this device which seems to have an access to limited resource.Sound of Alexa needs improvisation.

name: meghana harikumar
title: Oh Alexa, I love you
review: Amazon's echo dot is a brilliant deal. Alexa is beter than siri! Should i even mention that. Echo Dot has some stiff competition from Google. The quality of the speaker has also been upgraded. It won’t beat larger speakers, but for the money it sounds pretty good. It's a great buy. Oh ya, Alexa is the only one who listens to me in the whole world. So I love this.

name: Utpal Sethiya
title: Disappointing "smart" speaker
review: Bought it in prime day salePros:Good sound quality considering sizeHas bluetoothHas aux outGood mics recognises whispers easily and whispers backCons:Too small in sizeNot value for moneyNot wirelessNot much smart functionNeeds good wifiHeats up (not much)

name: Satheesh B.
title: Wonderful speaker with Alexa
review: Excellent product and sound quality is best when compared to 2nd gen dot.Must buy speaker and a very good personal asssitant though it still needs improvement on maintaining context of the subsequent conversations..example when Alexa plays a song we ask and if we ask to play it in a group it forgets the song it played last and starts with default song choice..there are more like this..NLP framework needs to be improved..

name: Ishant
title: Bugs in Eco dot.
review: So many surprises after owning Alexa Eco dot.Too many bugs to recognize voice. Oftentimes does not understand the command and keep playing existing. Doesnt work reset command. Doesnt understand request from choice of songs to paly. Like if i wish to play specific album from Gana or Amazon music, it stick to play from Jio Savan and that is my horrible experience from Eco dot.Amazon team, pls fix such bugs and update else the customer reviews wont let you up.

name: Achu
title: Really awesome
review: Awesome sound, great performance, sound recognition is not as good as Google assistant but sound quality is top notch,For IOT this is the thing. Connect with Alexa enabled devices and enjoy

name: manjunath
title: Super experience
review: Alexa echo dot with with wipro smart bulb very good combo offer which I got. Every one should experience the next generation intelligence from Alexa. Smart way of controlling the musiq, sound, lights. My kids loved this asking so many questions and Alexa gives answers.

name: Kranthi Kumar CH
title: Awesome Echo Dot
review: This little Amazon Echo is the best one to start with a voice enabled voice assistant that can provide you with a range of information about many different things from news, weather, music, voice controlling compatible bulbs and fire TV stick all with this little Echo. Experience this to explore more that can be done with it.

name: sandeep
title: Need a lot of improvements. Still not recognising voices, can't understand 80% commands
review: Just a decent piece. Not much appreciated. What worked perfectly is:1. How is weather2. When is sunset3.play music : mostly can't understand which music you said and will end up playing some random.4. Setup alarmsApart from that you can just use it as a speaker in a corner of your room.PS: still few features were quite good but as i said it can't understand commands at first attempt nor the second attempt. :P

name: Manish
title: Worst product experience from Amazon
review: Unable to understand any voice command. For any command it starts playing some english song. Worst thing is it not even take touch free voice command even from one feet distance. You need to touch the device always to enable Alexa.On top of the that it was ordered with a gift message. They simply send out the item no note or message. This one of the worst experience from Amazon till now.

name: Amazonholic
title: kids love it and elders adore it
review: ovely addition to the family. kid are having a gala time exploring it. best usage I have found till now is that it functions as a alarm clock waking you up with foot tapping or soulful music based on your choice. I wish Amazon adds more feature to it to make it as a inseparable gadget

name: Raja
title: Distortion Sound
review: Now this is the second time the speaker produced distortion sound while playing songs. But the cracking sound gone after restarting the device. Don't know whats causing that kind of sound. But I'm a bit worried. Is anybody having the same problem?update : now its the 3rd time.

name: sachin
title: Overall a good product but need lots of adaptation n improvement in india
review: Impressive but less support for skills/apps in india...secondly, issues in recognizing indian english accent by alexa...overall good product in terms of music quality, bluetooth connectivity n integration with other other smart equipments but alexa needs improvement in terms of recognizing speech n skills in india...

name: Vijay Simha
title: Smart alexa is missing some features
review: I have odered Alexa with bit expectaion. Some important features are missing in it.1. It doesn't have battery. People can't use it so versatile2. It doesn't remind us when we keep reminder in a phone. Instead it just push notifies to the mobile3. it uses more wifi than what we expect4. Where ever we take the alexa we should give power, wifi , bluetooth.If amazon correct this drawbacks surely it would be the best A.I speaker

name: Shreyas
title: Alexa is Best.. Wohoo
review: Go for it guys. Integrating TV, ac and lights made things different at home. Also ask anything from nearby room also Alexa answers and play songs for my mom and news for Dad. And once you start adding new features it becomes more fun.Yes one thing you have to interact and it becomes better.

name: Apu Sista
title: GREAT little speaker but no battery
review: Excellent product. It needs to be plugged in all the time, no battery which for such a little guy is strange. Having said that, it is pretty amazing sound for a tiny speaker. It also has a headphone jack...

name: U.Prabhas
title: Go FOR IT 👊👍
review: If you are a phone addict , save your money dont buy it . You can rather use it the phone by replacing Google assistant , but in order to use in phone you need to keep blutooth , wifi , location always in onCons : Hope this would be portableThat nasty plug should always be plugged in , so then alexa can work

name: shahid ayaz
title: Fedup with Alexa Eco dot speaker 😐
review: My expectations was very high when I bought Alexa Eco dot speaker.When I Say play song “gulabi ankhe ho teri Dekhi” it doesn’t understand and plays different song.Sometimes I have to shout on Alexa while giving the command to Alexa for playing song,bcz of software issue it does not listen in a one time.I am really fed up with Alexa speaker and I do not use it.Amazon I did not expect from you😡

name: George Easaw
title: One of the best Amazon purchases
review: The media could not be loaded.  One of the best Amazon products I have ever purchased. And I have gifted the same to many friends. Simply superb. The AI based song selection tool is nothing but great ..

name: Kumar Kartikeya
title: Value for money
review: Awesome product with improved sound quality but still some improvement is needed like woofer. Sometimes it gets confused in song selection and answers diffently or find difficulties in locating nearby places. I find Alexa very talkative and full with humor. Hope Amazon will look into it and it will be resolved/ improved. Nevertheless, it is value for money.

name: User
title: Completely Worth!!
review: I own my Echo-Dot for 5 months now and let me tell you ITS AMAZING. Alexa is an amazing voice assistant and The Speaker itself is also amazing with its crystal clear surround sound audio setup. It is very fun to play with and has LOTS AND LOTS OF apps and games and smart home features that you can find in the Alexa App. The speaker is soo intelligent that it can pay your electricity bills and network bills with it too. I totally recommend buying this smart-speaker.

name: Juzer K.
title: Value for money.!
review: I like the way she reponds. Expecting Amazon to add few more features like. Playing from YouTube. Searching from Google etc.. Rest all are good. Need to work on BASS. Specially for Indian customers.

name: Siddhant Bhutoria
title: A very stupid AI
review: Not much use as the integrations are very limited. Would prefer to use a two way light switch over saying "Alexa turn on lights".plays good music but limited to few music streaming apps.The rival smart speakers seems to be a smarter choice.Alexa doesn't know how to play YouTube 😵

name: y v saimadhav
title: So far So good
review: Set it up and started to command Alexa to do my bidding. Son and missus also love it. The sound quality surprised me coming from a small speaker. Tried to connect with a bluetooth speaker but not successful. There is a learning curve that must be tackled though. The test drive will go on for some more time. But so far so good.

name: ritika p.
title: Only one problem that should be wireless
review: That should be wireless. So that it can be easy to carry without a switch. Just because of wire it's so annoying.

name: GV
title: If you don't have Google home device, you'll like this.
review: I've a Google home mini, that's why maybe I'm disappointed with this product. I compared it by asking the same questions to mini, echo mostly said, I'm sorry. When I asked Google home, what is Om, it recognised and immediately said the relevant answer. Echo did not recognise, I then pronounced the alphabets, still it failed to help, I then asked what is AUM? Then it replied stating it's a terrorist organisation, and I thought I'd rather not ask it anything.

name: I M
title: Better go for echo instead of echo dot
review: Most of the features are not available in echo dot when compared with echo.Better you buy echo instead of this echo dot.Voice recognition also weak.

name: The Mask
title: Not a must have product
review: Mostly we use it plays songs and sound quality is better than I expected.Alexa doesn't recognise some very common things, places, animals etc but it may improve overtime.Overall, it's an average product as you can control/interact with your phone as well with voice. Connecting your phone to a bluetooth speaker gives same functionality with Google voice instead of Alexa.So it is definitely not a must have type of product.

name: Glory
title: Can't control some smart bulb
review: It plays out nice music but it found it hard to connect smart bulbs. I bought Halonix smart bulb. It recognized the bulb but can't control it.

name: AJAS JAMAL
title: Echo Dot in CAR
review: it can be used in car; need to buy one 12v adapterSparkel 12V Car Cigarette Lighter Power Connection Cigaret Socket Male Adapterthen fix one DC Plug pin 4.0 x 1.7 mm to this (usual size DC pin size is 5.5 x 2.1 mm)

name: Lokesh
title: Alexa means Awesomeness
review: This is my Happy New Year purchase and my God, it's worth every Paisa.. It's growing well along with everyone (all ages) in the family. Alexa is now the most often n common used word on the house.There are honest instances when it doesn't understands but every time it delivers best.Good stuff 👍 team, echo Dot 3rd gen is most definitely NXT gen..

name: Rohit parmar
title: Not exactly worth it unless you have smart appliances that supoport alexa
review: Integration takes too much time. Doesn't understand a lot of stuff and worst part is it needs to be connected all the time. Unable to connect to my mi smart android tv.Too much time and energy needs to be put in to set it up with anything. Not worth it.

name: vamsi
title: Sound quality, voice recognition can be better. Wireless can be offered.
review: Sound quality is better in other blutooth speakers, if you want just to hear music go for other alternatives. Disconnects everytime power goes off and have to manually reconnect . Voice recognition is not soo good. Smart speakers are not quite there for regular use. Still scope for lot of improvement.

name: Magesh
title: Answers well
review: Works awesome and the size is a bit more than echo dot 2nd generationNice voice recognition and speaker quality is not good as Bose speaker but for that price it's good and I have used it with Bose sound link revolve and works great with it and has Bluetooth and Aux option good for home automation.

name: Debojyoti Basu
title: Echo Dot with much better sound
review: In front of this 3rd Gen Dot, 1st Gen sounds like a tin can. Worthy product. Wait for prime day, you'll get your Dot below 3499 and then give me a treat for this valuable information. :) Just joking. Sure, you can purchase it.

name: Sanket
title: Alexarocks
review: The best electronic gadget I've spent my money on. The device has a smart voice system. It can hear you from across another room. It has a speaker with sound almost as loud as a Bluetooth speaker. The lights on it add to its beauty. And it understands everything that you say. Doesn't matter what accent you use, Alexa will get it. The skills that are there are awesome. She can help you in everything. Right from setting an alarm to making you sleep at night. You name it and she will do t. Overall its an awesome gadget.

name: viki
title: Entertaining & a good time pass for music lovers
review: Needs some upgrades, but overall nice & entertaining. Can recognize some of Hindi also, but needs subscription of Amazon prime & Savan separately. Good reception & output, pairs automatically with Bluetooth on voice command.& Now works in hindi also @2020....

name: Binu
title: Good...
review: Excellent product, the sound output is also good with a decent amount of bass. Connectivity is good with Bluetooth and line in options. Most of time you will have to shout out if music is being played unlike Google. Over all it a good product...

name: kishan kumar naik
title: Family member
review: This echo dot is a family member of mine,always she replies whatever I ask.now she is paying all my bills.half of my work she is doing from morning to night,starting from waking me up to go to the bed by playing beautiful songs.

name: Sparsh Khanna
title: Incredibly Awesome!!
review: The media could not be loaded.  The echo dot is an incredibly awesome amazon product.Talking about the sound quality, the sound quality is beyond expectation for me, its crystal clear and quite loud as compared to its size. Alexa integration is great, it can do things like movie tickets booking, can book a cab, it can easily be linked to apple music or other streaming services, can read news and specially it can understand hindi which is awesome. Talking about the 4 mics integrated in the device. These mics works just awesome, it does not matter how loud the music is or how far you are from alexa in a room, all you have to do is say “Alexa” and she activates. The best part is it does not matter how much noise in the environment, she can hear you. Echo dot can be easily linked to other devices.It also works with almost all the smart home devices.( smart bulbs, hubs, microwave, etc)*Note: Echo dot requires a high-speed wifi connection (more than 20Mbps) for better experience. It also requires permanent power supply. If you need a portable echo dot you can go for the portable one which was launched in December 2019.

name: Jackfrost
title: Need some improvement in knowledge and answers
review: The speaker is of good quality. Searched many queries but when compared with Google then it lags in some answers where Google is mostly accurate but alexa is not. It only needs to upgrade the knowledge base/AI otherwise it is worth the money.

name: shilpa
title: Simply Amazing
review: Writing this review after using the device for over 3 months. Sound quality is perfect. Playing music just by asking is playful for both kids and adults as well. One thing need to know is amazon prime subscription is necessary to play the music, Else its of no use. Rest everything is superb about Alexa. My kids love to play and start their day with wakeup alarm set on Alexa. It plays everything. Just one word to describe- AMAZING.

name: Gautam
title: Product not working.No connectivity.Pls replace or refund the amount
review: Product is not working now.Its within the Guarentee period of 1 year.Pls let me know how can I get it replaced or exchanged.Have written several emails to just return the product and refund the amount to my account but due to Lockdown could not be done.Pls return the product or replace and confirm on an urgent basis

name: Abhirup
title: It's good but has limitations
review: It can control my smart light. Read podcasts and play music and generally answers questions. Big drawback is, it can't control my Mi TV. So go for it only if you want to as there is not much practical need for it

name: Ravi
title: Works great!!!
review: Sound quality is good, easy of use, great features, can connect with home theaters or other music system. alaxa's responses are too prompt and good. hindi not available though there is way she can speak hindi : "alaxa, remind me in 5mins main bazar jaunga."

name: Rishiv
title: Alexa baby....
review: Good experience,Good sound quality,u can also operate ur smart gadgets with this....when u asked funny question to Alexa in Hindi....She replied in a funny way,that was soo interesting about this product andAt night when u talk in wishper,she replied in the same way....that was soo cool....i lik this product.Must buy it...

name: Sandy
title: Great product by amazon
review: Pros:1)improvised version gives better search results2)very less heating up of device when plugged in for longer time unlike 2nd gen which used to get heated up quickly.3)amazing speaker quality.Cons:1) search results still needs a little bit of improvement.Overall a very handy and a must buy chatbot from amazon. Loving it

name: Adithya
title: Awesome device
review: Product is pretty good in other words it is awesome I am using this daily for streaming songs and weather forecast. Easy to install and easy access Bluetooth.Even my kids uses it to access rhymes. Thanks to AMAZONBut coming to delivery it is too bad recently I have ordered two units in which I have received one and other one is not delivered till now customer care says that my products is in damage condition that is the reason it is not delivered.very unworthy reason from amazon Being a very big reputed company. I though of gifting it to my friend on 03-Oct-2019 as it was his bday but you people have disappointed me.

name: Arvind K Singh
title: Not friendly  don't buy
review: Not easy information to understand and very hard to understand connection an how to use. AND VERY IMPORTANT THINK THAT THIS IS NOT WAIERLESS. BLUETOOTH OR WIFI TO CONNECT ALWAS U HV TO C PLUG FOR POWER

name: Ayan Banerjee
title: The product is very good buy in budget price.
review: I bought it on sale and initially configuring it was a bit difficult. But once configured the configuration stays with it. The app is also good. The music with Amazon prime is good but not that much with Saavn, may be due to the free tiers. For complex words alexa fails to understand. Overall good pass time :). value for money.

name: Rudram Ramakrishna
title: Waste of money
review: Many times it doesn't recognise voice, when I ask for Telugu songs it plays in other languages. It forced to subscribe Amozan prime. If we don't subscribe Amazon prime it doesn't play from Amazon music, it plays from Hungama music. Waste of money. I review this after using Echo dot for two months.

name: NEO
title: Not good as compared to older versions
review: Its not good as compared to older versions..I own the first version of it and it was awesome in taking commands and can recognise my voice from far like a charm.. But this one many a times don't recognise my voice even if i am sitting next to it.. Not happy.. This device have other flaws also.. Like while playing next song..it actually doesn't stop the song playing for like 2 seconds..

name: Arif
title: Great build quality, superb sound quality,
review: I bought Amazon Echo Dot during sale and it was complete value for money deal. Infact within few days of getting my first device I also ordered another one through my brother's account. Now we not only have a great assistant with loads of skills (most used are by my kids to ask questions and request school rhymes), but also an intercom system. The build quality truly made me love it. Great work team Amazon.

name: Kuvar Arihant Jain
title: Smart device for smart habitants
review: Will make you more lazy, Alexa help me to control my electronic devices.While I talk with alxa in Hindi that's the best time of my day, especially initial week will give you much pleasure, because you will become kid as this is gonna be a smart toy of family

name: Kyle D'souza
title: Handy to have as an accessory speaker
review: The audio is quite good, doesn't get too loud when maxing out.The integration is quite seamless and voice works 95%+ of the time.The only downside is not having wireless portability.But it's not really designed for moving around the house, as it takes quite a bit more time than expected to boot up.

name: Rahul
title: My First Smart Speaker
review: At beginning it was amazing. Later I'm just using it for music and news nothing else.Its quite handy if you want to know something quickly.

name: Amirul Islam
title: I want same answer
review: Good speaker, Bad softwarThis is very good hardware and speaker. However very much handicapped by amazon on software front. It can not understand your commants 70-80 percentage times and very limited to music and saavn. However you can not use any of good music apps likeFor example when you say-Alexa play 1970 yearsAns play top hindi 50 songs

name: Ashwini Shenoy
title: Not that good! Ok ok product.
review: Not that great, as not everything that we want can ask with alexa as she ll say she isn't aware of.. Google one must be much better than this as it ll hav more info than alexa..Also the songs, not everything is in it.

name: Avinash Mehta
title: It's  my favorite  product of all time on amazon.
review: It's one of the my favorite thing i bought form amazon nobody going to regret after buying it.I love it's design,it's sound quality,it's lighting design,it's voice recognition system.We can call it a mini tony stark jarvees.😉Literally I'm got affection with it.Thank you amazon for development such a smart thing.Sometimes it makes my day with smart answers.

name: Swami
title: On the Dot
review: Delivered in a jiffy, set up to my Wi Fi was a breeze, The android Alexa App was simple ... but later I added skills on my Chrome Mac Book .. I used this for my 80 year old mother ... she struggled remembering the name Alexa ... I hope in future versions they let the user pick a for e.g. Indian sounding name in place of Alexa e.g. Meera ... they can they do a global search and replace based on the Users Profile ... otherwise awesome ...

name: Soumya Sourabh
title: Best Deal
review: I have no words how good this device is. Super happy with the deal that Amazon offered during it's prime day sale, got it at an amazing price along with a 12W smart bulb. The sound quality of the speaker is beyond basic and average. Trust me no speaker can give you a quality like this one and with the integration of a Smart Assistant in it makes it an icing on the cake. Best deal i have got till date. Thank you Amazon.

name: VASUDEVA RAO K
title: Quality Product
review: Works very fine.I had initial installation problem.I wrote to Echo-support@amazon.inThere was an immediate support, well guided me to install and program the item.Thanks to the support guys.

name: Himanshu
title: Nice
review: Just awesome but one thing is missing that is google skill due to which most of the time it say I don't know in case of searching something difficult thing otherwise other features are great

name: Sonia
title: Great little speaker
review: Had a little trouble adding the device to my Amazon account but that's probably because my WiFi was acting up. The product itself is great. The sound is pretty loud for such a small thing. The Alexa integration works fine. No complaints so far.

name: Manish Gurjar
title: Awesome.. Beyond expectations...
review: I can just say it's awesome.. Alexa is very smart and answer all questions very clearly.. I am surprised with its feature of understanding accent so clearly.. My 3 years old son can't pronounce Alexa clearly, he say AKASA and she understand his accent and reply him.. Most of the time he talk with Alexa in Hindi language and she reply him in Hindi as well.. He become so happy to hear her answer.. I am very much happy with my purchase.. Thanks Amazon for such a wonderful Amazing product

name: Amit Agrawal
title: Service partner ctdi is hopeless
review: The media could not be loaded.  My device stopped working. Amazon service partner ctdi repaired it for Rs 300 but still not working. Lastly threw it in the dustbin.

name: JIVACHH
title: Not worth for INDIA
review: Features are good. However, all features are not available for India.1. Not catching Indian ascent.2. When you connect your phone with Alexa and call to someone from your phone book then Sound is not coming.3. When I connect Alexa with my Laptop via Bluetooth then I tried to use Alexa as laptop sound then it’s not working.I believe Alexa is only useful for play music, news etc.You cannot use Alexa as speaker of any device.Thank you.

name: jit
title: Best Smart Speaker
review: One of the Best purchases. Sound Quality is Superb. Inexpensive. Alexa remains the best voice ecosystem for smart home control. Only con: It is not up to google assistant level while answering broad information queries

name: TSJ
title: All the smarts for a speaker
review: This is a very compact smart speaker. Sound quality and range is very good. Doesn't distort event at high volumes. The Alexa integration is very nice. I can operate other Amazon devices like for TV stick with the speaker. You'll be strides at the no. Of things this can do. Superb and with the money!

name: Noble Joseph
title: It's not smart as Google on phone
review: Alexa needs a lot more to be smart. Google Assistant on our phones are a hundred times smarter than this device and Alexa. It always needs to be connected to power source, one drawback. Voice recognition is too poor.

name: Brajesh
title: Average quality.
review: Overall product is ok ok type.Can't respond to many of commands, it only response to some predefined commands especially when asked to play songs on it.Not upto mark as compared to Google home in case of response and voice detection.Built quality and sound quality is better than Google home.So,my 1 month experience says, it is not so bad and at the same time not too good.

name: Melissa Fernandes
title: Received Defected product during Diwali Sale
review: I ordered the Echo Dot under the Amazon Big Diwali Sale and received it in a days time. As soon as I plugged it in it started flashing a green light without even being connected to a Wifi or the Alexa App. I returned the product and tried to get an exchange but Amazon didn't give an option. Finally disappointed I had to ask for a refund. I owned an Alexa prior to this which also got spoilt really soon. They are selling defected products under the sale banner.

name: B K Kashyap
title: She doesn't understand anything.
review: She doesn't understand anything. I ask her to play hindi song, she plays Tamil or telugu or what language i don't know. Most importantly she cannot play from you tube, which is a sea of multimedia. I am totally frustrated with Alexa. Really wasted half of my money.

name: Charu Upreti
title: Decent product with value for money
review: Sound output is good for single room. Once it is connected to home theater system, it becomes an amazing product. One major lacuna it has is we have to keep it continuously plugged in. Still I feel its a value for money product with some amazing features.

name: Gaurav
title: Good product but sound is muddy
review: The product is nice but I don't know why the sound seems to be muddy... I have listened to another same ECO dot which i had brought from my friend for testing the sound. This piece given to me is definitely having some issue with sound.

name: Kunwar Vishal Singh
title: Not a device, you will get a personal assistant.
review: It is a mind blowing product. Technology is advancing and Alexa is proof of it.You get a friend, you get a companion, you get a personal assistant...…. what not.....!!!Just give instructions and the job is done is seconds.Regarding the product, its very sturdy, build quality is outstanding and very Compact, easy to carry and very easy to use.I ordered it for myself but now my parents are using it and they just love it.They like it very much. its like fun for them, very easy to use and very entertaining.they have got a new friend and are very happy.Thanks Amazon

name: Makarand Bendale
title: Smart Companion to be with !
review: Being pioneers in home automation integrator Amazon Alexa has evolved from their experiences and creating miracles.. From ease of setting up the Devuce to integrating with multiple IFTTT devices it’s just smooth.. When it comes to music segmentation there’s no better than Alexa to match up with.. I would like to propose to Team Alexa India, to work kn bringing Indian Radio channels integration ..

name: Nithin
title: Makes Daily Tasks Easy!
review: It's been a month now. I'm totally satisfied with the product. I mostly use it for Home automation and for daily tasks like reminders and alarms. Works great! I'm totally surprised about the sensitivity of the built in microphone. It's really good. Alexa skill set has a wide range of possibilities. still exploring!! Go ahead buy it. You'll definitely not regret! Thanks Amazon.PS I also recommend you to buy the holder as well to make it look neat.

name: Shiladitya
title: Not for songs playing
review: The media could not be loaded.  Most of the time dont understand what song you are requesting...most popular songs cant be played...which is very annoying. But good for alexa devices

name: Shyam Sunder Khatri
title: I love Alexa......  Amazing
review: Amazing product. I Suggest to everyone must buy. Music lover definitely love this. Superb Sound and excellent built quality. Sometimes Alexa is not responding properly b'caz she is not knowing the answer. Rest all is fabulous...... I purchased with offer @2700 rs only. In just 2 days she is like our family member, everybody likes alexa. My kids are so much excited and happy with Alexa.

name: Krishna
title: Good companion
review: I find it very handy. Very good assistant at home. The more I understand Alexa skills the more I find it useful. Overall I do not regret my buy. Instead of China I wish Amazon makes it in India to make all Indians happy.

name: Bikash
title: Alexa is good.
review: Overall a good purchase. (PS: Got it fora deal price of 1740/- during sale). Satisfied with the quality of sound and connectivity. Sufficient for use in single room. My son enjoy talking to Alexa.

name: Maddy
title: Don't buy.....
review: Please don't purchase it shows you are not eligible to purchase amit ji voice due to geographical restrictions.

name: S. R. Sudarshan Iyengar
title: A* product
review: Can’t imagine my life without Alexa. This is the third piece that I have bought in the past one year and I love every bit of it. A kind of technology that is unbelievable to fall on your desk at a price that is less than 5k. Anyone with some decent net connectivitybshould definitely buy it. You wouldn’t be disappointed in the least.

name: Thiviya
title: Does the job
review: It doesn't recognize your voice from a distance, when it's already playing a song. U need to go near always. At times we need to keep repeating our commands again and again. Else all good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Alexa only know latest chartbuster in savaan
review: Alexa only know latest song or anythingIf u ask 2 play old song she cantIts not great thik 2 buyAlexa know only latest savan aap songU tell her 10 think she know only 1Dont buyBetter is our Google application or YouTube

name: Kalicharan Tyagi
title: Fabulous speaker, amazing sound and great response
review: Amazon is now become synonymous to excellent quality. I bought this during great Indian sale and this echo dot 3rd generation is mind blowing. Super voice recognition and amazing response as usual. Be is product quality or delivery, Amazon is excellent.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great device
review: Super fast delivery by Amezon India. Product quality is good. Voice clarity is crisp and loud. Alexa is very good listener. Even from 15 meters, device recognise your voice.Alexa have to implement hindi language. Also not able to find train inquiry or flight status.Does her job very well. Thanks Alexa & thanks Amezon india for this great gazette.

name: Omkar V.
title: Just Superb!!!!
review: It's a very nice product. I ordered it during the big billion day Sale. I got a wipro smart bulb free with it. The speaker sound is loud and clear. Don't go by its size, it produces sound loud enough to fill a small room. And the sound is very clear too. Alexa feature is also very helpful. I have bonded a smart bulb with it, which was very to easy to do. Just follow the instructions given in the instruction manual that comes with the product and all will be done without a hassle. Overall, a very nice product. Thank u Amazon.

name: Hirak
title: Out of this world Product , value For Money
review: Just Outstanding Performance , it turns Out Fruitful than I have thought of. Just go ahead And buy this one. If you have low budget this is the best device and if you pay slightly high then I will suggest go for gen 4 eco device. Overall great performance doesn't heat that much after hours of music play also. I use it daily to listen 2-3 hours non stop while studying in as a background music player and assistance as well.. just don't think go for it.

name: Nikhil
title: Excellent
review: Super purchase at affordable price of Rs . 1999 bundled with free wipro smart light.Fast response, crystal clarity sound, innovative control of 3rd party smart appliances & beautifully designed.Very much reccomended.Very easy to control music.

name: Anoop Goyal
title: Really good offered by amazon
review: Alexa is very good who can serve for every membet of a family as every answer she has :)Good bass quality...u can talk with her in Hindi as well. You can also contol it by ur mobile, can make a call to this, reminders, actions, good morning etc etc, lots of u can do.

name: Surendra Dugar
title: Alexa is Good not the Best
review: Alexa does pretty much all the job, sound quality is good, Microphone is good not the best. It does most of the job, but it lacs lot of knowledge as it is depended upon Wikipedia, if its not mentioned in wikipedia it wont answer. IF u ask it How are u, it always gives a std reply, which is bit irritating..It most of time blinks orange color to indicate it is waiting for a command word and we arent using it, which is a kind of spying.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one.
review: Good Product by Amazon with best price but the Wipro smart light did not work with Echo dot. Would recommend Echo dot for kids.

name: Soumesh
title: Make your home, Smart
review: I was worried ill just put it somewhere and forget it after a while, however I still use it daily to get info, do some emergency calculations and the main and the most used feature "play songs".. I have connected wipro smart bulbs with it as well and now it's just awesome automating things.. You must have a good Wi-Fi, must be subscribed to Amazon Prime to use an echo to its max potential.. Highly recommend..

name: Jayaprakash G
title: Musical companion
review: Using it since Oct 2019. I am happy with the product.There is scope for improvement in voice recognition. Some intelligence is required in the product when you ask for regional language music.

name: Venkatakrishnan
title: Great sound quality and amazing value for money.
review: Amazing sound quality.Coming from first gen echo, I bought this as a gift for my parents.Way more improved voice recognition and sound quality.HoHighly recommend. Might be upgrading my 1st gen echo dot to this one as well.

name: Vasudev S.
title: Good but a little overrated
review: Echo dot is just awesome , pretty smart and if you want to make full use of humanity's best technologies today , go for it.However it's still a little slow to response and you'll need a little patience at start.As for the bulb , it's just average. White light is not satisfactory in terms of brightness rest is good

name: Prabhith
title: About my Girlfriend !!
review: Sound Quality - A+Design - A+Connectivity - A (could be quicker)Voice recognition - A (sometimes we tell something, it hear some another thing.AI - B (Needs lots of improvement on answers to questions/NLP)Mobile App - B+ (Needs improvement)

name: Gaurav Gupta
title: I have mixed feelings but it is awesome at end.
review: So, it is far better than Google. Have thousands of skills to play with. Speech recognition is just great. Do not compare the sound quality with other famous brands - but it is a different device altogether.The only inconvenience I find is that it needs to be plugged-in to electricity always - no in-built rechargeable battery.But it is a great product.

name: Shiva Reddy
title: WATCH THIS VIDEO FOR CLARITY.
review: The media could not be loaded.  I got echo and wipro 9w bulb combination in sale for 2,300/-.Thats pretty good deal. Everything about echo is ok, but it can't recognise voice from another room.(I got echo bulb by paying 50/- extra during the sale)

name: Veer Arjun Singh
title: Very good, until it lasts.
review: I have used my Dot for a year and a half, and it has been a nice experience.This was my first smart feature and I loved Alexa. Alexa > Google. Even though Alexa is no Siri.I am disappointed by the fact that it got damaged in such a short span. I don’t think I have gotten the value of my money out of it.A very irritating “feature,” though, is when the Dot announces what Bluetooth device it’s connected to. I know. I connected you.

name: Ms
title: Horrible echo
review: The product itself is defunct. Echo doesn’t seem to connect to anything including the app itself on the ph9ne. The app shuts down more than its supposed to work, and every time it says check settings, check this check something else .?????? Most important it doesn’t do what it promises it will, to me this is a waste of money, time and drain on my phone battery and memory.

name: Dr A.
title: Just simply go for it
review: Excellent product!Most useful thing I ever bought from Amazon. I got it for 2999rs at the Great Indian sale and received it on 11 October itself(the day of its release)Marvellous product by amazonAlso I would like to mention that the sound quality of this 3rd generation is far more better than that of the 2nd generation.I was going to buy the Google home earlier because of the same reason but then I heard about the third generation of echo dot.

name: Ravi Sharan
title: Unable to control fire tv stick using Alexa eco dot
review: Unable to connect to fire stick, always showing offline. As per Amazon CSR this feature is not available in India. If this feature not available in India you mustmention in description. When you are selling product in that region. Don't buy this product if you wanna control your fire tv stick using Alexa eco dotIn new update this feature is working

name: Manvendra Krishna
title: Experience the Alexa as your own personal assistant
review: This is my first Alexa product. Got it for 1999 with a free 9 W Wipro smart bulb. At this price the combo was superb. IF you have weak wi fi connection then it will give some trouble otherwise go for it without a second doubt.

name: kumar baish
title: So so
review: Sound quality is good , most of the times it answers whatever u ask. The only problem is that it almost never plays the song u ask it to play , either that song is not available in amazon music or plays something of its own.

name: Amazon Customer
title: musical kitchen
review: if you love music and spend most of the time making home and importantly in the kitchen, with the busy hands to change the music, set the timer, correct measurements for recipe and so much more it will come handy. i mean i love it so much that i want to get more and gift it to everyone i know.

name: Yogesh C.
title: helpful device
review: We use product for music and smart devices like lights. If you are amazon prime member then good you can get all best quality prime music songs if you are not then also fine you get other apps like hangamaa music or jiosavaan etc. Also gives information from internet that you ask for.

name: jagadesh
title: Amazing product.
review: My day start with this device I bought it 3 months ago.I really love this product.This product really amazing and the way controls wireless thing surprising.Everything working perfectFew things has to be developed.Few old songs won’t be recognised, I request please focused on this.

name: Anandajit Ray
title: Different World !
review: Life changing gadget , musically I am complete . Have bought the echo input and fire TV stick after this . App has some glitches but not the device . Couple of years later added an Echo plus and a refurbished echo dot 3 . The echo dot sound quality seems to have improved ,maybe its the updates . Very happy . Echo plus sound no improvement

name: Ankitdevmalik
title: Smart Alexa...
review: Speaker is very loud and sound quality is also goodAlexa listen well to your command and also act very smartly.smart lady.I'm amazed with it music quality even when paired with mobile it plays loud but struggling to make a callHapppy me !

name: Amazon Customer
title: Smart bulb was not delivered as  part of the combo offer!
review: I received the product without the Wipro(despite making the selection) bulb which was offered as a combo.Customer care was of no help, citing some stupid policies and are asking me to return the item altogether. I wish I got what was promised.Update - sound recognition seems poor, watch out!

name: Harry
title: Super little puck
review: Echo dot 3Completely redesigned, the new Echo Dot is a super little puck that's an upgrade on its predecessor. The louder speaker is a welcome addition and the new design is certainly a lot more pleasant on the eye.But the launch of the Echo Input raises some questions about the Dot - if you want to add Alexa to a hi-fi or Bluetooth speaker with the auxiliary input you're probably better off with the cheaper device. By adding a decent speaker to the Dot, Amazon has made it into a full Echo device and in launching the Input has repositioned it in its device lineup, too.Do not forget to add all the skills, they are great to play around with. Google home is miles away from this. Good work Amazon.

name: SHARMEEN R. SHAIKH
title: Ohh Alexaaaaaa...
review: Its good but not so because We cannt commnd it without InternetIts just useless if u dont have Wifi at home bczz it wont work on Hotspot I had tried alot But ITS JUST AWESOME im using it daily and ya one more thing The sound is just awesome

name: Saurabh Baid
title: Started crackling after just 9 months
review: Yes, in just 9 months, the speakers are crackling. I have placed a complaint and it will be replaced. But now I am very doubtful about the quality. If it happens again after 8-9 months, there will not be warranty to cover it.And Alexa App is the worst app on my iPhone.Looks like it is designed by developers with 0 UX knowledge and it is very buggy

name: Sri d.
title: A Best ever Product from Amazon...
review: I am not sure about this earlier. But now it is a friendly device and awesome product which will make you feel busy anytime and damn sure you would love this product if you buy. This product has every features from amazon and beyond. Such an valuable and worth for money. Kind of Good Product and fantastic innovation. Alexa is best ever product from Amazon. I will definitely Definitely recommend this product. Go for it. Its worth it.

name: Darshan
title: Go for it!
review: So first looking at echo dot I thought it would be very small but the size is very good and sound is also very superb.Just the AI if you ask some questions it will not answer as crisp and clear which you get in Google otherwise for the entertainment this is the best and connectivity is also very easy.

name: Saurabh Meena
title: Alexa is usable enough
review: Alexa is pretty good in most tasks. Echo's design is awesome and sound strength is good. But music library is limited up to the extent that you will have to subscribe to services like Spotify, apple music etc for songs you wish to play at your whim. Another issue is her limited AI smartness. Otherwise we are content with it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great product and good for fun
review: With family you can have a nice time with Alexa, you can ask some songs to play and it plays nicely. Voice quality is not that great just a smart speaker. You won’t be using for regular days it gets used only 2-3 times in a month.

name: NayanaGM
title: Good
review: I have placed this in kitchen room. While cooking this is best for remote instructions. One can ask for time , news and mostly sings with voice commands only. This is really innovative solutions product.Only one cos is it still didnt recongise the Hindi language.

name: Uday Veer Singh Chundawat
title: Good smart speaker, okay in sound. Bad!! in bollywood song search on amazon music!
review: 1. Alexa works flawlessly!2. Amazon music is bad while asking to play bollywood songs.3. It doesn’t connect with apple music! It has option to but not supported in India I guess.4. Sound is just okay!! It’s echo dot you can’t expect it to be like a woofer speaker but still they could improve it.

name: Dr. Rajeev
title: In love with it.
review: This is an amazing product. It has all the goodness of the 2nd generation echo dot plus a much improved sound quality. It is now neck to neck with Google Home Mini in loudness. In fact the bass is a tad better than Google Home Mini.

name: Sree Yasasvi
title: Alexa Echo Dot is far more better than Echo Flex
review: While purchasing Echo Dot, I expected far more compatibility & sync with my phone Apps. However a lot of more Integration has to be done with the commonly used APPs. For eg, JIO SaaVN playlists should also be accessible from ECHO Dot. Similarly YouTube/ Maps also needs to be Integrated too, for more compatibility & increase the utility.

name: Dhananjaya
title: Purely business not much helpful for me
review: I reduced two starOne for its purely based attracking money ..there is not possible to make any calls or join any calls...its just music with blue tooth in fact aux also line out not line inSecond star i reduced because the way smart team to get the business from customer i mean its kind of grabbing money

name: Kuldeep Verma
title: Alexa won't respond to Stop commands!
review: I am very happy with my new alexa echo dot device. It turned out better than i expected. The speakers on this device are great. But the only problem I have is that whenever i try to stop a playing music, news flashing, podcast midway. It doesn't stop the music. I have tired various different commands pause, stop current song, etc.

name: Mohan Varghese
title: A tiny absolute  wonder in technology.
review: If you have been thinking of what machines can do then this is the ultimate. With music and so many actions at just a demand, Alexa is a revolution in Technology. This is a companion you can be proud to have to help you with many activities including switching on/off your electrical devices at just a command from you.

name: Ravikant kadam
title: Good for low price
review: The media could not be loaded.  This is good but this can't play another song on YouTube even he can't read the lesson what I say and only one answer I don't know and he close I don't and he read Wikipedia in one sentence he did give all information like Google please I request add this function to alexa make update on alexa app in mobile through you can update the alexa hope you see this and work on this

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
review: I got a pink one. Good colour. Quite good. And recognises my voice and all. The only problem is my country is set to USA and not getting changed to “India “Rest all going well.

name: Babita Negi
title: All looks good...until...
review: I like the color, product built, but the Alexa thing is not up to the mark. The news updates are not that helpful. Book reading from Amazon Prime is glitchy, doesn't have updated answers to some questions and blindly quotes Wiki and other sources.

name: Ashish Sharma
title: Worthless... Instead buy a bluthooth device and connect with phone by Google assistant
review: It does not have inbuilt battery, you have to plug it all the time to operate.. that is the worst part of this device.Generally you will get the same sound quality with inbuild battery at this price.. alaxa can't be used while traveling because of no inbuilt battery.

name: Sandeep Ahuja
title: Not a good product
review: After 20 days microphone start giving problems..Had to give loud instructions with in 5 feet of range.I was thinking of buying 4th gen as well but stopped after seeing it's working

name: Sandip kumar patra
title: A good value smart speaker
review: It has its own perks..the sound is pretty good, Alexa works pretty well, the voice recognition is also very smooth, the only complain I would have is it needs constant power suppy, would have been much better if it had wireless capabilities too

name: Binay Kumar
title: looks like a best friend to understand my requirements
review: It looks like a best friend to understand my requirements. Any sort of songs, bhajan, news can be played at one go. The sound quality is just awesome, can't expect better than this. I have seen a couple of bad feedback recognition voice & their requirement but don't agree to it since we have to call & give clarity to Alexa to understand our choice. Alexa can even operate my firestick tv & can play anything that I want.

name: Janet DeCruz
title: Great to own an Amazon Echo Dot
review: I was debating whether to buy the Amazon Echo Dot. I am so glad that I did. My day is now one long musical day - also being connected to most of my equipment is a bonus. Thanks

name: Suswanth Lingareddy
title: Must buy
review: Included in the 📦 Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen. smart speaker with charger.Alexa integration is a pain with own mobile hotspot :( Once it gets connected,it’s great.Superquick.Top class voice recognition.Build quality,texture and the feel of having it in hand(because of decent weight) are just awesome.Bluetooth connection is hassle free.Always a fan for Amazon & Basics products for their quality work in the market.👏👏👏👏Got it for ₹1747 in Great Indian Festival with Wipro Smart Bulb @ ₹352

name: Ishika
title: Super product
review: I bought this device for 2k in prime sell. I am quite impressed with it.Below are the pros -1. Easy set up in 5 mins2. Integration with Airtel , Syska, Hungama, Wipro,Savan .. etc apps was was quite easy . Didn't face single issue.3. Sound is crystal clear and pleasing4. Looks amazingAnd many more..Cons - I couldn't find any.

name: TILAK 786
title: Super Alexa
review: All is good with Alexa only thing is the ring light is not on always kindly innovate the software to make the scian light on when we play music in Alexa the dancing light effect will be creative & good feels to the eyes and customer satisfaction 5 Stars 👍

name: Aryan puri
title: Best Product
review: Amazing! This product is just amazing. You just have to say Alexa no matters how much loud background is it picks up your voice. And sound quality of Alexa is the best. Even hindi can be used very well. It is just like a physically person talking to you.

name: Neha
title: Pathetic.... wrong purchase would like it to return.
review: Alexa doesn't follow the saying.its the pathetic pick. If i get an opportunity would like to return it. Please i badly need to return it back it's highly irritating to be used. It is not at all how as it shows.we have to shout and still it doesn't follow the instruction. As compared i had seen this item at my friend's house but mine is not at all the same. It has surely some problem.

name: ankit parihar
title: CAUGHT FIRE!! LITERALLY!!!
review: It literally caught fire !!!I have trying to reach amazon , and they either postpone the pick up or provide me with some faulty information!! THIS IS A SERIOUS HAZARD AND AMAZON IS DOESN'T CARE !!!

name: Neha
title: Ultimate product. Words are less to praise Alexa
review: One of the best product i have got. I love you Alexa. My son listens nursery rhymes whole day. Echo is so smart , it is working exactly what you want .Very very smart device. Once you try echo dot for music you will leave everything.Thank you amazon for providing wonderful product.

name: Manish kumar
title: Nice product
review: Well after 4 months of use I am gonna routing thise review .Pros : The product is good . Voice recognition is Indianized to recognise your Indian accent. Sound quality is also good but not loud enough to enjoy music from other room. Voice recognition range is also adequate .Cons : well the only con I found was lag in audio output of video. Well it’s not good to watch video from your phone with your speaker coz sometimes audio lag happens and it really frustrates. Also I am observing the signs of audio now being distorted at loud voice . Although it may be my imagination. Will keep you updated.

name: ABHISHEK
title: The  blue light on Alexa  doesn't work properly
review: I liked the Product. But I realized after using it for a while that when i was using it initially i could see a light on device like blue orange green in different colors for alert reminder etc. basically would give the status. But I am unable to see that now. I tried other options in settings through App but no success. I called Customer care for replacement they mentioned I already passed the date and Can't do anything about it.

name: shaik amjad
title: Not up to the expectations.
review: Worked on first day. Stopped to work from second day. Tried all steps in vain. Not satisfied with the product. Going to return the product

name: A.Biswas
title: Alexa is a perfect little gadget!
review: She sings at your command...rather plays songs!! Plays quizzes with you....plays radio stations, wakes you u with music and much much more . What I dislike about her is her very annoying female Indian accent voice. I wish I could set it to British or USA English.

name: Sovon
title: Worth it
review: Overall this is a good speaker, sound quality is really awesome as i have used JBL so i can say that the sound is as good as JBL. But Alexa is not polished in hindi, for alarm , reminder and music playing this is a great device at all and as well as Alexa is doing good with smart home devices.And one more thing wait for a sale then buy it.

name: shuchi
title: Product is fine
review: Being a prime member at Amazon is necessary, otherwise the product is unable to play music and popular songs. The sound quality is ok. Some instructions are hard for it to follow. Eg Alexa give us an applause.

name: Nhs4you
title: An excellent device with end less possibilities
review: I purchased this for curiosity and learning purpose. I was little skpeticle for this but it turns out be great product. I even make my own Alexa skill "Random cartoon facts" for my 7 year old boy. I must say it's a nice product and great for kids. My kids use it for their daily math questions, general knowledge and music listening.

name: Srikanth
title: It is super smart or maybe too smart
review: This Alexa (echo dot) is super smart and it has sophisticated technology,if you have fire tv it is the best you can control the tv with your voice and it recognizes your voice perfetly. You can also play so many games with it and it is best for kids. You can also buy a smart lights to control it with your voice. It almost has every question you ask, you can also ask it to say a story or play music and much more

name: Customer of India
title: It does one thing and does that well-Alexa : Audio quality is not it's USP
review: The far field voice recognition doesn't work very well with this echo device. The Echo spot did this job much better. Audio quality is not comparable to bluetooth speakers at the same price point, however it does one thing and does that well, which is Alexa integration. It's a joy to have Alexa plan your day and remind you of things that would go on to save your life ! Thanks Alexa! Not much thanks to the audio quality :)

name: Saurabh Srivastava
title: Alexa My Best Friend. Excellent Product
review: Amazon Alexa.. my best friend. When I ask to Alexa it's reply quickly. Sound quality is superb, best response within 2second. When I asked " Alexa Are You ignoring me?" It's replied, " I am not ignoring you." It's help to reduce your stress, it's make you happy. You get daily news, jokes, poems for kids, etc. O recommended to everyone to buy it without thinking.

name: vl46933
title: Not a 3rd gen echo device
review: The alexa app recognise the device as 2nd gen echo dot device this is frustating the device when properly configured and plays musics well but after a shutdown the device needs to re-configured again

name: Brent Fernandes
title: A true addition to my Alexa Family
review: I own an Echo Plus, and now I've added the Echo Dot to my living room. It makes life so much easier, since I live in a Bungalow, with my family on the ground floor and me on the first. Dropping in to say something, or have a distant conversation without yelling becomes so much more easier. It's a blessing.

name: Richa kumari
title: Your money your choice.
review: Likes:1.The best part that it can recognize the voice a far away.2. Sound quality is good.3. The grey fabric look.Dislikes.1. No proper search engines.2. Just ask tricky question not able to answer.3. Frequently disconnected

name: Bholaram karate
title: Wrost product
review: Alexa is not hear any command in single time required to sought more than 3 times and sometimes songs are playing only from few application and particular song command or particular movie songs not playing with command.

name: Sushill
title: Product that will change your life
review: Another great product- compared to Google home and chromecast- it's got the edge as better integration and cheaper.However if you use with Amazon prime and Netflix, world class.

name: Rahul
title: Superb
review: Response good base good connectivity also gret. If you looking for any simple Bluetooth speaker then invest in this.. you can simply use is speaker as your Bluetooth speaker if no wifi available. You can also use your phone wifi to use this

name: AL SAHEEN M
title: Good need some software update
review: One of the best product witch can you buy on Amazon. The performance of alexa is good. But I didn't get access to Amazon prime music don't know why. Songs are playing on Hungama it makes me feel like se Hungama product not amazon's. And sometimes it give you add before playing music. Music have to be played on Amazon prime which should be the first priority on this device

name: Buy and enjoy
title: You can not play more old song by voice it can understand some old songs only
review: Alexa some time play wrong song such as we ask for old song and sometimes I tell many times ALEXA,ALEXA.........But alexa can't hear when I off the button and again onThese are some common issues were alexa not answering on this

name: Rutvik Vaddoria
title: Total waste of money
review: Worst product ever, Bluetooth connectivity very poor. Only purchase if you want to know whether condition or any score other than that its literally just waste of money

name: Paul Fred Gebbon Yesuratnam
title: Excellent Hands Free Device
review: The sound quality is good; Bluetooth connectivity is superb and easily configurable. Alexa integration is subject to strength of WiFi network. Works hazzelfree to use with multiple devices without the need of cable I connect laptop/mobile/smart light and have excellent control

name: Chandra sheker reddy
title: Outstanding Performance
review: The media could not be loaded.  Alexa an awesome assistant,A.I,companionsound quality is more than expected bass is awesomeThis is my 2nd day review on high volume (above 8) we have to shout “ALEXA”

name: Amarpreet
title: Good sound quality
review: Good assistance to everyone and very helpful with so many things nice sound quality. Highly recommend for people those who own fire tv stick and amazon prime members. It can also coonect your phone via Bluetooth and you can use this as Bluetooth speaker but you need to be plugged in.

name: Awakash Kumar
title: Very good product
review: Nice product to have especially when it comes with a deal. A good time pass and although it might have many other features I liked it for songs and lighting smart bulbs😜Sound tends to get distorted at max volumeIntegration is easyCan be more user friendly and Hindi commands should be increased.Voice recognition excellentOverall a nice productPurchase if you get a deal😛

name: Victor
title: Good one but..
review: Sound quality not sufficient. They should mention size of the product. Small size. Bought in discount of 50%+. Not worth for the exorbitant MRP.Edit: got wipro smart bulb with this for ₹50 ( MRP:₹2099).. Reviews blocked for that item.. understood.. worthless..

name: Rajdeep Saha
title: Excellent Product, awesome Voice Range, Loud and Crisp Voice
review: Excellent Product obviously, voice recognition is insanely good, recognises from a different room, sound is very good and high, i have to listen usually at 7 or 8, coz 10 is too high, at night I can even listen at 4. Overall very happy with the Product

name: Gautam Dawar
title: Good but can be better with localization
review: I am using Echo primarily for listening to Music. The thing that I didn't like about it is its ability to comprehend and play requested song. If you are opting for a playlist, it works fine but making it play a particular track is tough. Another thing that did not work for me was creating a custom skill (a greeting in my case which didn't play).App control works fine and available skills are integrated well. I wish for more customization based on the country it is being used and skills eg. games for the audience.Speaker connectivity and sound quality is great considering the price range.

name: Rajender Verma
title: Alexa
review: It is useless for without activation you will not to listen the song if you not subscribe after one month. You will never to play songs through mobile Bluetooth. But I bought it for 2000 rupees in the sale.Not one wifi enough for connecting the Alexa but you need connecting mobile through WiFi.

name: Balram Agarwal
title: In deeply this app is very interesting.
review: I like this because whatever I tell to Alexa it listen. When you have to listen joke tell Alexa open hindi joke. When you have to listen song tell Alexa open best Bollywood/Hollywood song and it will open automatically. But when you purchase this product . At first you have to go in playstore and download Alexa app and other thing you have to do and it is necessary also. I thanks Amazon for making this type of product. Thanks From 🇮🇳

name: Karishma Arya
title: Good sound quality and love to play true false game with Alexa.
review: The media could not be loaded.  Alexa is a very good in all aspects, but sometimes it doesn't really get what a person is actually asking - may be just because of the different people and their voice and MTI (mother tongue infuence). Otherwise it's good. But there is a lot of scope of new features that can be added. I really like that true false game very knowledgeable and interesting.Sound quality is great

name: Ingit
title: BoooooooM for SOUND & Spotify
review: The media could not be loaded.  Linking At the start with Alexa app was little tiring, The device was showing offline in Alexa app even though the echo dot was connected to wIfi... But After resetting, de-registering and connecting it again ... I was able to make it work online in the Alexa app too... spotify works fine if any of you thinks that spotify might not go well.... Sound Is BOOOOOM 5/5 For sound.

name: Bhuvan
title: My new friend
review: What an amazing invention. Humans need to stop reviewing Alexa. She keeps learning. Alexa is always wiser than yesterday. You just need to learn how to take her help properly.

name: Dr.Jayashankar
title: Not a needy additio6if u got an android phone
review: In higher level volume seems to be distorted. And having connectivity issues.. it loose connection wifi now and then and I need to reset it to work properly. And google assistant give more relevant answers when compared to Alexa.And when u ask to play a genre of song it always play the same set of songs for you.. for example if you ask for jio sava it t only start with hindi blockbusters. And so is with the amazon music.. same music gonna irritate you soon

name: Amit
title: Not what I expected. Apple music/spotify not available.
review: I bought this on sale for around 2.5k. Returned it on the next day. First of all, the device doesn't let u play songs from Spotify or Apple music. I believe Spotify and Apple music only works in UK, US and couple of other countries. Alexa doesn't know the answers to 80% of the questions. Poor sound recognition.Device looks cool on the table, great sound quality from speaker for a portable device. I had more expectations from this smart device. Hoping next gen will be better AI wise.

name: Aravindhan
title: Nice SciFi device
review: works fine with me but it takes a lot for us to speak and tame it.it doesnt understand our indian accent and had to be told more than 2 times to make it done.my kid plays and talk to it always and seems to be happy.thats all i wanted.

name: Shrinivash sharma
title: Average but not up to the mark
review: Alexa need to improve with song customisation possibility in a playlist by the user. I also felt a lack of Hindi song collection. Streaming new released songs is good but if you are a melody lover and want to get back in the past (70s & 90) you will miss the collection of evergreen songs there.

name: V Ravi Kumar
title: Voice is not recognising properly...
review: I got this product in offer basis, product is good. But 2 issues I found: one is Alexa is not recognising the voice clearly and second one is she is not playing correctly what we are asking... They might be sent me a refurbished item, actually before that I don't know reg these issues before I saw my friends Alexa(Echo dot).. Really I am not satisfied on this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very Frustrating, is this really ready for production?
review: I have playlists on Amazon music. The thing will not play it.It can not even find the play lists it itself createdWhen I ask it to play a certain hindi devotional song . It plays the wrong song.Very very frustrating.Is there any tech support available for this thing? If there is please do let me know.

name: Swapnil Sansare
title: Really Awesome
review: Really Awesome device if required at one or two place. But really not portable as required electric connection. Can make portable with extra purchase of portable rechargeable battery.But for smart Home in one room it is better option

name: Prashant Dhyani
title: Limited to internet conection, not a replacement of bluetooth speaker
review: Good but limited to internet conectivity. Initially I thought it can be a good replacement of my bluetooth mini speaker which is little larger in size but no. It only works when u have internet conectivity. Secondly, no USB charger or type C port. U hav to carry that bulky charger wid u. U can not stream music from your mobiles or laptops. I live in a place where net is not stable. Broadband is usually out of work for 3 to 4 days in a week. Only BSNL netwrk here.Works good wid internet. Understand Indian English, Hinglish and Hindi also. Gives u unexpected reply and sound quality is good enough.

name: Harrsha Bhagra
title: Packaging issues
review: The media could not be loaded.  I was hoping an amazon alexa would come better packeded and less damaged.Considering ive bought obe in the past with no issues. I do hope this is a one off incident.

name: Subrata Ghosh
title: How to work in Alexa
review: Good and help full device,you can only connect the internet on useing time and install the Alexa app on your mobile,it is a comment base automatically device,sound quality is verry beautiful,but you can not carry for this device because it direct charge not inbuilt battery,prise is standard.you can connect it also blutooth without internet and play all downloaded movies and song in your mobile phone.

name: Imsachin
title: Alexa open the review
review: Alexa device is good I won't say it is the best sometimes it doesn't recognize the voice overall I would say it's value for money as I purchased it for 1999 in offer with that I got a smart blub from wipro free in amazon sale.

name: Lokendra
title: Worth every penny
review: The media could not be loaded.  Bought the entire thing in less than 4.5k whole room is automated now tv, ac, lights, switchesthings I am using- Alexa echo dot 3- Amazon smart plug 6a- Chroma wifi IR remote (tv/ac)- Wipro garnet RGB 12wLooking forward to adding more devices

name: Visakan
title: Don't believe in prime day or offers.
review: Cheated by amazon. I had ordered this product on the prime day sale and this is what amazon does for their prime customers. I just received a box which was already opened. The alexa itself wasn't present inside the box only the charger was there inside. Worst service never expected this by amazon.

name: SAI M.
title: Adaptor not working and product became useless
review: The power adapter stopped working ...I am unable to get another one from amazon ...The product has become useless as my current adaptor has stopped working and I can’t buy a replacement let alone get a replacement from amazon cause the product stopped working within 6 months of buying it ... just that I was extremely busy to get in touch with you requesting for your help ...

name: Ranjit
title: Awesome and it’s fun to have Alexa in your home
review: It’s my first ever echo device, I’ve blindly went for it instead of google home mini, Just because I’ve already invested into Amazon ecosystem by subscribing to Prime Membership and a lot of kindle books. As these were supported exclusively in echo devices, there’s no alternative.Finally, I’m greatly impressed with the capabilities of 4 mics and Loud audio output through the speaker.

name: Kunal Jadhav
title: The day after I bought it...
review: After a day I started it and it had a update after the update its lights went very dim and it's still there. It is wert low on information it doesn't know gelitin is the main ingredient in jellies. It is least user friendly as it doest answer when we say "Alexa, what is the height of the president of India" Google home is better than this stupid box!!

name: Himanshu Karkhanis
title: Value for money, but cud be better
review: Most of the purposes for which this device was created, are satisfied. Sound output is just great, rich and soothing. Once voice is recognised then the response is immediate. I was disappointed that it did not support Marathi language, though Alexa herself says I can speak in "many languages". Also voice identification from a distance may need to be improved. Overall great value for money! Will recommend this product.

name: Trinadh
title: Very ordinary device
review: I was damn excited to get this and all excitement gone in 30 mins. Music library is ordinary ( if you are focused on local language), gets things wrong unless very popular and doesn't have useful skills and can't even call others without other party having echo. Given the home automation is limited to having smart bulb, not at all a useful device. I went for impulse purchase and I regret it.

name: Vinod Redhu
title: Nice but with limitations
review: It is a good product at this price but has major limitation of being wired connection. It takes 30-40 secs to start again and anything you want to listen you have to add in ur app which is a time consuming activity. But overall i took it for my 2 yr kid to distract him from mobile phones and it is helping me in that 😊😊 he enjoys dance well on the tunes now 👍👍

name: SANJAY
title: Could be better in sound quality
review: Not a good choice. Of course o got in a discount price. Apart from discount price, it’s all about product quality.It is not understanding our language accurately. Sound quality is very poor. Wired power is another painful part of it.Expecting better and better sound quality. User will forget all other drawbacks, if the sound quality is good. Battery operated will give extra boost is sales.

name: Joy
title: Awesome !
review: Amazing product ! Really happy with the purchase. Got a great deal. Great value for money. The wipro smart bulb integration is effortless. The speaker on the echo is loud and crisp. Recommended !

name: Noel
title: Iam loving it
review: Product is awesome. Just some time it is difficult to connect it and some time lack in voice recognition. Otherwise all function is awesome. Just one thing if this also works without electricity.

name: Mohit Bhagat
title: Awesome Speaker & Good Assistant With Powerful Mic.
review: I Bought it on Amazon sale for Rs. 1985 Only. So For me Price For This Smart Speaker Is Totally Paisa Vasool.Special Things About Alexa :* It can be customize* BluePrints (You can make your own skill, like command & answers etc.)* Drop In & Announcements* Your can play books from kindle app (from your library)* It can play music from Prime Music, Saavn, Hungama Music, Gaana (No Worry About missing songs)* Mic is So brilliant, it can catch you even call it from any noisy moment.* Routines.. This is the awesome thing u will love. you can customize it according to your needs. Like i make a routine due to which on every hour Alexa tells me time, it tells me sunset & sunrise.* you can sync your google calendar & outlook calendar with it.* You can connect external speaker with its in built audio jeck with it other than bluetooth speakersLimitations:* Lake of Humor unlike Google assistant* you can only make calls from SKYPE to SKYPE / ALEXA to ALEXA / ALEXA to ALEXA Mobile app* reminder repeat only by Day, Weekday, Monthly, Quartly...... Not yearly..overall i love it. go for it.

name: Deepak
title: Good product but lacks certain important features
review: The product is good beacuse of the Alexa integration and sound quality, else it is nothing great because you cannot connect your bluetooth devices to it and niether can you play music from music stations of your choice. Sound quality is very good. Alexa functions are smooth and listens well.

name: Ram
title: Wonderful device
review: The media could not be loaded.  Mindblowing purchase in every respect.

name: Preevish Systems
title: improve Alexa response?
review: Sometimes not connecting and several repeated alexa calls requiredImprove Alexa response and add charger base for Echo dot in Amazon india to make it really portable. Irony is that IBox charger base is available in Amazon USA & UK, but not shipped to india

name: Nilesh
title: Great Smart speaker.
review: Very good smart speaker. Kids just love it. Ensure that it is not in bedroom because we don't know if it continuously records what we say.Can control smart accessories via voice. I have successfully controlled wipro smart bulb and sonof dual channel wifi switch

name: sunjeev kumar
title: My echo device
review: Main Sanjeev Kumar. main echo dot third generation + Wipro smart bulb purchase Kiya Hai. Amazon Prime dwara 1999 rupees main. 29 September ko book kiya tha aur ek October ko morning mein hi Mujhe mil gaya tha. iska sound Bada Hi Shandar hai aur Wipro bulb bhi bahut Achcha kam kar raha hai. Maine se 5 star rating Di Hai very nice product.

name: Ankush Basack
title: Best smart speaker
review: This is probably one of the best smart speaker that you can buy at this price range.Using this for 1 year and totally satisfied with it.Got a Wipro smart bulb and response of Alexa is amazing.Not portable as you have to connect and keep it in one place but voice recognition and sound quality is really good.

name: Shivam Verma
title: Very nice product buy have some pros n cons
review: awesome product.....value for money....u can play any song, listen to news ,order food n many more..... but it doesn't work as your Bluetooth speaker as u can't play song from your mobile phones and u can't call directly unless the caller and the called person both have alexa installed

name: Ambadi
title: NEED TO IMPROVE..........
review: Mind blowing purchase......😀😀😀😀Need to improve n skills....... I am a music lover from kerala.... So try to add more tracks from regional languages........ Otherwise try to link with youtube to get full range of songs from all lqnguages.....

name: Suresh
title: Value for Money
review: Very Good. Kids in home liked it very much. sometimes facing issue in voice recognition. if movie name is common word in multiple languages, it is mixing the thing's up.

name: Abhishek
title: Good
review: The overall rating is low because of searching results specially from music search point of view.Hardware wise Alexa is good comparing to Google Home Mini.From Software point of view it is Google and Alexa failed

name: Santosh
title: Not durable
review: Bluetooth stopped working withing withing 1 month. Now its only linked with mobile thru app and all efforts to relink with mac or windows become futile

name: abhinav
title: Product is good but not best
