review: Using from almost a year now . Perfectly fine in sound quality and voice recognition. I recommend this if you love listening music and to operate smart devices. But sadly it doesn't give proper answer if you ask general knowledge.

name: vimalan
title: Must buy in a loot offer
review: Purchased in a loot offer for 1229.. Awesome for d price I paid.. Not worth if yo pay more than one thousand five hundred... My kid njoyyinh with it... Setup was very very easy..njoyyinh with free led bulb.. Sound quality is average..bt connectivity is good... Using it with mobile WiFi.. working well...

name: Kajabhai Patel
title: Hello Alexa..
review: Awesome Device.1 Amazing Sounds Quality2 Great Performance3 Bluetooth Connectivity Fast4 Thanks a lot Amazon India5 Voice Control100% RecommendedHare Krishna

name: Anonymous
title: Perfect for small room
review: Its perfect for a small room, recognize both hindi and english voice commands effectivelySound quality is goodGot this with wipro smart bulb and the combination works well

name: atif ahmed
title: Connectivity in the car
review: Great productJust wanna add-Actually with the older variant we could connect it through the car charging port through usb and can enjoy the device in the car as well.. but with this dc power adapter it is not possible.. this is the only con regarding echo 3rd gen

name: Arun Gupta
title: A must have device in everyone's home
review: Its artificial intelligence is awesome, recognise almost everything in English and Hindi language.

name: Himanshu kashyap
title: Hats Off!
review: What to expect, everything's done by alexa is quiet awesomeIt really became a friend of mine to talk to.Sometimes alexa doesn't respond to my voice, maybe amazon has improved the sound quality but they also should improve the listening of alexa.

name: Sachin Tapikar
title: Kid or Grand parents.... Alexa makes their life happening....
review: Such a wonderful product specially for kids and senior citizens...My 6 YRS old daughter and 76 YRS old mother enjoy their choice of music at their convinience.... Also they stay 150km apart and always stay connected by just calling each others name....rest is done by alexa... Look forward for further drop in prices and make it affordable...

name: Amazon Customer
title: All time active divice to attend our needs.
review: Excellent device. I found this device is boon for senior citizens like me. It is awesome for youth to enjoy unlimited skills, routines. Its doing wonderful job by voice, routines like light operation, play music in scheduled time. I am very impressed with its remote controlling. We can operate lights, music with mobile phone app.

name: Flora Plethora
title: Have it if you are a techno freak
review: The speaker though looks tiny but has powerful voice. Alexa doesn't understand few instructions or request related to Indian context. We may have feed that information in its app, if you have patience you can build on alexa's intelligence. But decent product, enjoying it.

name: Lhakpa Dhondup
title: Buy it on Amazon sale,
review: The media could not be loaded.  Like every thing about it, make your home smart, and buy it on Amazon sale, the real prize on Amazon is 3600 rupee with smart bulb, but I buy it for 2500 rupee with smart bulb 💡

name: Amazon Customer
title: Satisfied
review: There are few problem in connectivity but sound quality is excellent if u love listing music echo dot is brilliant .Eco dot is a fantastic smart speaker but being a music lover i wanted one thing that is if alexa had a option from which we can create play list.In starting I have find issue that alex didn't able to recognize my voice but after sometime it was fixed. Now i am satisfied, i get in a fantastic product in great price....😍

name: Ansar Hussain
title: Expected lot... substandard
review: Face difficulty to recognise voice when device volume above 50%, sound quality average, device software sounds bad not value for money, have to improve lot in next level device updation. Google mini far better

name: Divya K
title: My Newborn loves it
review: I got this for my newborn and she absolutely loves it... I play rhymes and movie songs and she dances to the rhythm... I also use as a white noise machine during nightI use the WIPRO smart bulb to keep it bright in daytime and completely dim during night which helps me to breastfeed and keep a watch on baby sleep. Thank you so much Amazon ... you are a blessing to me

name: Satish
title: Sound quality and integration with other systems is very poor
review: Likes:Ease of SetupEase of UseCollection RangeVoice REcognitionDislikes:Integration to other systems--I have Sonos but there is no Skill in India to control Sonos, same feature is available outside India. Wonder why it cannot be extend to IndiaSound Quality--There is lot of scope to improve sound quality, quality is very disturbing

name: Mahesh kumawat
title: The new Echo Dot is the best compact smart speaker on the market .
review: Impressive full sound qualityInexpensive introduction to smart home controlAlexa smarter than everImproved aesthetic befitting modern home designBetter microphone sensitivity

name: Abhimanyu Bhattacharjee
title: Dont buy this #BinodBewafahai
review: My echo dot first one died in 2 months...the voice started to crack. Replacement died in over a year. Nothing great in the product. Speaker quality is below average. AVOID BUYING THIS IS #BINOD

name: Ansel
title: Rich and Elegant
review: Everyday I start with my dear Alexa, the look is very elegant and rich....sound quality is best for a small device....connectivity for all devices and network are best.. she amazes our guests all the time with new skills...

name: KLV Prasad
title: Alexa is a Worst piece of ****
review: It is one of the worst purchase I ever had... Alexa is not at all suitable for indian community, especially south indian... it is better to use google home or any other roadside AI bot...

name: SARIT SINGH
title: Best Smart Home Device
review: I bought both Echo Dot (3rd Gen) and Google Home Mini a month ago.The sound quality of Amazon Alexa Echo Dot (3rd Gen) is very good and the response also gives better than Google Home Mini.Google Home Mini requires fast internet while Amazon Alexa works well in slow internet connection as well.Where we give 3.5 stars to Google Home Mini, same will give five stars to Amazon Alexa.

name: Ankur Gupta
title: Product reliability
review: I have ordered Amazon Echo dot 3rd Generation but there is nothing mentioned on the box or packing whether it is a normal Echo dot or 3rd Generation with upgraded features. Today I saw a deal on Amazon app where the same echo dot along with free Smart bulb is delivering with less price so I have doubt related with product reliability now.

name: HBR
title: Not that great, voice recognition is very poor, feels like a toy for children
review: don't expect that it will work like you see on TV adds, it works for very few basic things, if you manage to get it for Rs.1500 then only its price is justifiable otherwise not.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Amazing
review: The product is very good and compatible with almost anything.i ve connected my bedroom moodlighting wth alexa and i can turn on\off, change colors.And i can control many other devices and the audio quality i really good.

name: Guhapriyan Thanikachalam
title: Great product with Amazing options
review: The product is very easy to use. Even my 7 year old son is able to use it well without any difficulty. I was able to pair our night lamp with this. My son is having a good time with it. Will update more after using it for more time.

name: Ravindra bagul
title: Great
review: It's worth buying amazon echo dot 3rd generation .Am in live with alexa.It's wonderful product, great sound quality, connectivity is okay, having trouble in connection but it's ok.Mic is very goodResponse time very great.Accuracy is about 80%.It's worth using smart speaker, but m not sure how log it's gonna pkay

name: Shubhankar Anuragi
title: Can be much better. Edit : They made it better.
review: Working fine.Sound Quality : 7/10Bluetooth Connectivity: 8/10Integrations : 9/10Overall 8/10Ps:Add Spotify to music apps please, I dont want to play from Gaana and other apps.. I prefer Spotify.Edit: They added spotify long back, I couldn't update this review. Big ups to the echo team for frequent updates!

name: nkmittal
title: Not connected with syska smart home
review: First of all good but when it comes to skills I am very disappointedI shows syska Smart home app can be linked thru Skilled but in skill no syska available!!!! I bought syska LED as a package but anable to use

name: Suhas Jalgaonkar
title: Great Sound & very handy.
review: This little speaker really produces very good sound. Perfect for personal as well as small family gathering. It has an Audio out which can be connected to outside speaker system or use bluetooth to listen to music from your mobile. Above all it has all the powers of Amazon Music.

name: Elina Sanyal
title: Alexa is Okay. Music is Bull**** . Screw Alexa when you have Siri
review: Alexa is decent when it comes to communication. However, the speaker is faulty when played at louder volumes. It’s shaky and unclear and most song lyrics almost sound muffled up. Very disappointing for music lovers who prefer clear sounds. Music quality differs from genre to genre sucking bigtime when it comes to playing Edm and commercial club music. You will want to cry it’s that bad.

name: soumik sarkar
title: Good innovation with good product
review: Good inovative product.Uses last two months no issues with this product. Honesly said product provide good imact according to its value.

name: Shiva
title: Intelligence
review: Awesome product.Interaction: 5/5Sound quality: 5/5Size:5/5It’s great it works like Bluetooth speaker when wifi not available, but it’s not. :( this made some disappointment.But overall impressive product.

name: Shrinidhi
title: Please don't buy...
review: If you are a true Indian don't buy this product... This is no way configured or supported for Indian languages... If you want to play Hindi or regional language songs it doesn't recognize and starts playing some random international songs... Very very irritating...I am sure Google device is much better for Indians...

name: Mohit Kumar Verma
title: Worth every penny, works flawlessly
review: I always wanted to buy Amazon Echo and was waiting the best deal to opt. Bingo, I finally got it at 2499 + WiFi Syska bulb. Though, it need hell lots of integration to make it work properly but the overall experience is going awesome.

name: Customer
title: Worth of waiting 45 Days
review: Its a device of technology , i waited for 45 days to get this device , but when used it , yep , its worth to wait for this , sound is awesom , mic hears from a distance even in crowd sound , features and skills are numerous and endlessShe is going to do whatever you ask and is possible for this device to doDon't wait , Go On!!!

name: Shanthalakshmi S Rao
title: one.
review: There Is NO battery Backup is most discouraging . Device need to be paired every time when power goes off. This is an added disadvantage.

name: Pramesh Kumar Darsena
title: Good product.
review: Good quality product.Good sound quality. Not compared with jbl or sony speakers but better than boat.Well it's not just a bluetooth speaker its smart.Alexa is very interactive it takes a bit time to update skills in alexa and then you can have alot of fun. It also has a aux output port you can connect any sound system for better sound.

name: Guru
title: Like it!
review: Routine task is I like most about echo dot. I set up some key needs in routine task. Everything from reminder to playing music, skills are I am enjoying with. But it tried initially to recognize my voice and failed. Later it denies to take up the test to recognize my voice is the only thing I am disappointed with. So, I cannot pay via Alexa when I order over it. Other than that, it is another companion.

name: Mandeep kr Gayan
title: would have been better
review: I got it during the time of sale. I have used google mini after using google I thought to upgrade it and check how is Alexa. It is good as well as bad from from google in different term. Alexa has better far field recognition but I think in order to save money amazon have made some cut offs from Alexa 2nd generation. It literally understand what we say 6 times out of 10 times.Well its a overall good package for it's price range.Sound is awesome 10/10.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall good quality product as a smart speaker.
review: A lot of improvement needs to be done as Alexa didn't understand most of the common commands. It will be really excellent if Alexa can understand command in the regional Indian language.

name: Nazeer Adil
title: Best Artificial Intelligent Assistsnt
review: Echo dot is Amazon's best cleation for artificial intelligence. Best voice recognition.Skills are very useful. Great for home automation.Loved it. Thank you Amazon.

name: Kiran N
title: Product is good, worst customer care experience, no resolution for discount no
review: Product is good, but not received instant duscount. Worst customer care, couldn't provide any resolution for my discount after calling repeatedly. So giving one star

name: sumit verma
title: Alexa, the good assistant.
review: Alexa is good. It understands the query well now. For conversation mode you need to train Alexa.You can change call sign of Alexa but there are only 4 options available. Bought in 2019 for Rs 1650/-. Now going to buy another on 26/07/2021 for Rs2249/-.

name: Yash Oza
title: Best for price
review: Sound quality = 10/10Response time = 10/10Basic commands = 10/10Fact based question = 6/10 (this doesn't matter at all)Overall best for the price.Bought this during offer period. In just ₹2750Got ₹2000 off and additional 10% instant discount with my bank.Definitely going to buy two more for my home. Waiting for similar offer.

name: Rajesh
title: usefull for new generation
review: its very usefull for new generations but only one thing is need hindi understand and give response in hindi will matter very much because all can use this easily i bought 3 pcs to all my colleauges and using very well enjoying much my daughter

name: Siva Kumar Hanumansetti
title: Cashback not received
review: Don't believe the cashback announce by amazon will provide the same. In my case, cash back not received 5% as stated in september, 2019 (even collect the coupon). Now, they are asking to provide the screen shot for the same. Now, they have removed the link. Same offer announced in october, 2019.

name: Happy Customer
title: Good product
review: It’s the future. Only thing that needs improvement is the voice recognition, some more intelligence to select the appropriate songs and sonund quality itself. However the sound quality is still much better than a lot of Bluetooth speakers out there of the same size.good product to have at home for kids and elders using voice commands.

name: Noumaan M.
title: Not worth that much money! Great for music junkies.
review: Cons1-Cannot do much woth it.2-Cannot make calls as it claims( only calls to other alexa users only).3- Not responding even during low volume music play.4- limited responses and have to be very clear5- Cannot play you tube at any level( not even music)Pros1- Portable2- Amazing loud sound.3- Quick response4- amazing design and cool blue light.

name: Parag Kondhare
title: Good product
review: Nice product. Easy to handle or connect, requires Amazon prime account for better results, gets all inputs from wikipedia. Works good with smart products.Here you can compare it with google assistance. Go through youtube for comparison. Might be google assistance information broadcasting could be good as compare to amazon echo dot. Basically google assistance is connected to google for information platform.

name: Vinod Mundhra
title: Very good product but bit more required.
review: I liked the product very much and it has got great features.Only thing it is missing is Auto Audio Control. When it play music, many songs plays loud while many at low volume. Very annoying to ask Alexa to put volume low and high for each song.

name: Nagaraju Sripathi
title: Not worth
review: Voice recognition is very bad and does not recognise the words for at least 50% of the time. Integration is good.. does not cause any problems while integrating. Half of the time very popular songs also are not recognised by Alexa. No settings to store the language preferences. All the time you have to choose which language you want to hear the songs

name: Rakesh
title: Meet you expectation for sure.
review: I have tried both Google and Alexa devices. And in my opinion, I cannot guarantee the future but till now, Amazon smart devices are much better than google in daily life usage.

name: Shakti
title: Fair product
review: Voice recognition is not that great. Need to speak loudly to make it function. Echo has far greater smooth experience. But considering the price difference, it's a good bargain.

name: Reader
title: Amazing speaker
review: We mostly use it for music playback and ambient noises. Its a fantastic speaker with nice bass. Checks all the check boxes except for the fact that it always had to be plugged in to a power source. Never had to use the Bluetooth feature.

name: Dishari M.
title: Terrible..
review: Not at all a good software.. terrible at voice recognition.. most of the time it will get you frustrated trying to play the music you want.. it only understands a set of pre configured commands correctly.. no AI whatsoever.. even the sound quality is equivalent to a bluetooth speaker one thirds it's price..

name: S Gupta
title: Alexa is Best
review: Alexa Echo Dot is much smarter and useful than than 1st and Gen, Easily listens even on High volume and most importantly Bass is good now in this small Echo Dot... Playing any generation songs are easy now... Skills have much more improved now..My family is loving Alexa

name: Shuchita Gupta
title: Superb Product
review: awesome product. just that doesn't listen at times. but its fun to have and great for music, timers, weather, cricket scores, shopping lists, controlling smart leds and much more

name: Dr. Milind Patil
title: Life changing experience with Alexa.. Love the AI interface..
review: Love the AIIts completely change the rutine. I now when I arried at home and say Hello to Alexa,, She gave me the news update and play instrumental a ngs for me.Alarm future which I love most. Now alarm naver be irritating. It paly with preset music. And i walkup with full freshness every morning.Whatever yhe price of this device, I recommend every home should have atleast on of it.

name: Teddy G
title: Great
review: Got a mind blowing offer during some sale can’t remember. Build is good. Weighty. Great sound quality for like say a bedroom. Might not be the best for a living room. Pairs well with other Bluetooth speakers. Very happy. Stating the obvious here but you’ll need Amazon prime for music.

name: Suraj H
title: Worth the money
review: A nice product especially when you get it for the deal i got. I bought it for just 2299 with smart bulb. So overall satisfied worth what i got.

name: jayati
title: Love it!!
review: Bought echo dot (3rd generation) along with the smart bulb at an offer price of around 3500. Satisfied with the overall product quality. Voice recognition is really good. I was earlier reluctant about the sound being low before I purchased it, but all my apprehensions got carried away once I finally played it. The sound is good enough to be heard across the hall and even the room next to it. Don't think much. Just go for it!!

name: SUMIT CHANNA
title: Read more review before buying it
review: We purchased our first Eco Dot from Amazon.Our family was very much excited to see how it works. But there is lots of issues with it. If your connection is lost ,than it will take lot of time to reconnect we have to switch it off and on Many times for reconnecting. Sound recognition is very very poor.My suggestion is for Amazon ,sound recognition should be made for Indian accecent.....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Could have been better!
review: Well.... These are the reasons for star deduction:-1/2 Aaj tak skill not working-1/2 Music streaming not directly possible-1/2 Hindi language support not available-1/2 Typically designed for expensive smart house control-1/2 Requires to be connected always to power-1/2 Does not control fire TV stick effectively+1 for my overcritical nature 😂😂😂😂But still...... It's an amazing product!

name: Sarta Mishra
title: Lovely gift for young children
review: I presented Eco Dot to my grand daughters . They are very happy & satisfied with it . They say that it is the best gift since now . Now I am planning to buy for me to listen old & new songs as well . In Deepawali sale I got this for 2500 ₹ with smart bulb . I am waiting for another sale . Sarita Mishra

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not a smart product
review: I was surprised to see that This product cannot be operated without power. Which limits its portability and flexible use. Also all the music sounds like Hungama music advertisements and Amazon product promotions.

name: Verified buyer
title: Your ultimate personal assistant!!
review: Best money can buy.Got echo dot 3rd generation + wipro 9w smart bulb@1999/=only during amazon great shopping festival. Must say quality of 3rd generation echo dot has been improved a lot. Sound quality is clear and loud enough for small to med room size.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Improvement Areas
review: Over all product is good.Would like to suggest a few improvements:1. Device should be wireless. Today's market demands wireless products2. A little storage space to remember things. For e.g. Alex remind me ---- at 00 hrs.3. Should be able to answer questions from web. Such as stock buy/ sell recommendations4. Provision should be there to add more music apps other than SaavnThat's all

name: Himanshu a Pawar
title: Mice problem while call or drop-in
review: Quote from Liz_M >>I have had my Echo dot 3rd gen , for a couple of months and in the past few days I have noticed I can hardly hear the voice of the person on the other end when using the device for a call or to drop-in on a contact. Is there any know issue/bug and fix for this? The volume is fine for any music or streaming, only the in-call volume is extremely low now.

name: K
title: Please someone from Amazon should call to get this fixed. Bad software needs attention.
review: Alexa integration is not seamless. Software definitely as issues. I was impressed by Amazon’s customer service as they called to fix the issue immediately just the next day after my feedback but after few days I am back struggling with it. Country specific integration has to be improved. I am struggling to make it work. Done reset thrice but the same thing continues.

name: Deepak chander s
title: Alexa eco dot 3rd gen is best
review: Connectivity is good it connects very fast and sound now very improved compared to Google home Alexa is great is sound . Bluetooth it is portable and the design is nice and we can make calls through Alexa app

name: HITENDER SINGH MAAN
title: Great product
review: Comparative good as Google AIIf u have Sony android TV don't need remote u can control it with Alexa commandGood for children even quit afficent to respond even 2 year old voiceComparable with all smart device good sound quality

name: Dinesh
title: Good product, interesting too go for it
review: Product is good, using it for 15 days nowFlipkart delivery excellent,Lack of Voice recognition ,Don't understand lot of thing and don't have answers in lot of time,Once started answering anything won't stop till it finished and won't repond in-between if we call alexa several timesGood for kids. Playful tooNeed always strong and continue internet data network.

name: VAUNCH SINS
title: Good stuff
review: My daughter has been asking for a friend called alexa and this valentine she got one and she just loved it. All her songs are being played at alexa volume 10 now-a-days

name: Steve James
title: Great Product
review: Review of this product after using it for 2 years.just one word, great product and working fine till now.latest AI updates give more features. Go for the latest version of echo dot, it's having much more features, overall happy with this product, best in the category

name: shubham
title: You Should tryalexa if you're new
review: You can say at the start if you're new to Alexa it's awesome, not bad at all, and even your family members love it as well but sometimes only it's doesn't work like if you ask something it will go down as nothing happened and also it will take more than 2 months to get according to you or your family music taste so in my opinion, it's gd overall

name: pCr
title: No Second Thought...
review: Advantage over G/Home mini1. Aux option to connect to Amp/Speakers2. Improved mic3. Improved audio quality4. TWS with a pair of Echo Dot sets In my experiment, Connectivity is found better in G/Home mini.

name: assamsabre
title: Responds very well.. the Amazon Day Sales are the best time to get an Echo Dot for every room :)
review: The Echo Dot is available for approximately INR 2,000/- during the Amazon Sales and matches up to any speaker at that price ! It is also an economical way to add the convenience of having an Alexa enabled device in every room.

name: Asish
title: Nice product but with a little lacking
review: About voice recognition , Alexa integration I would say, it is fine but as compared to bose this echo dot lags behind but over all this is not bad at this budget price. What One thing I want to point out is, it cannot recognise if it is requested to play a particular song or album unlike Amazon music app. This lacking has to be resolved. So I am giving 4 star.

name: Keshav chandran
title: Nice little device.
review: Sound quality is great , voice recognition works flawlessly even for a 6yr old. Easy connectivity . Be sure to have a stable high speed internet connection. That's all it asks. My son uses it to learn country capitals , general knowledge and grownups use it for music ,traffic updates etc. Overall money we'll spend .

name: Shubham K.
title: Not what I expected from Amazon
review: The assistant is nice. But i found it to be quite fluctuating in its voice recognition. Base is no good. Customer support is worst seriously the worst customer support from amazon. They just hear the problem and keep u on hold and never resume the call.

name: Sagar s
title: Useless just because we can't connect to power bank or any USB power plug
review: Everything is good except that power plug n power adapter.. we can't connect it to power bank or in car... That's why it's useless product , I m thinking to return it? Atleast Amazon has to provide some sort of connector so that we can use USB input to power plug.... That's the only reason why I m giving 1 star for the product...

name: Malay
title: Alexa..!! Nice to listen ..
review: Alexa...!! Nice ,Interesting.. sound quality is really nice..Ring light on top owao... Looks superb..1st time Settings to play is really irritating, it's take more time..and their have some limitation to play everything..need prime membership.. some time not Campture correct instructed voice..It need implementation to capture more language except English..it will be easy to use for all.. But Nice product..

name: Jatt SD Singh
title: Need more improvements
review: I bought it with Wipro smart bulb at Rs 1999. I think it is with at this price with also a smart bulb that's bestOverall it's performance is also good but not like I thought.Sometimes it don't recognises the song and play other songs.I have used Google Home Mini also and it is smarter than AlexaBut every thing have some drawbacks.If you get it under ₹2500 I think you should go for itSound and Bass quality is fantastic and also Bluetooth connectivity is great

name: Abhinav
title: Pricing is confusing
review: Pricing keeps fluctuating for this product. I ordered Echo dot and Wipro bulb combo, so Echo dot price is the order shows less than 2000 but if you purchase only Echo dot, you have to pay 2999. Isn't it confusing and deceiving?But I always Enjoy Amazon products - Alexa app, Echo Dot, Fire TV stick.

name: Saumya rajput
title: No power backup!!!
review: There is no power backup! Alexa needs good networking signal then only will activate otherwise connect with your phone...!Perhaps China product..... Chale to Chand to na chale to shaam tk....

name: Amritpal Singh
title: No point in buying the dumb bluetooth speakers anymore
review: Fabulous product with such an easy of operation that my aged mother uses it seamlessly. Easily recognizes hindi language. In the morning she just commands it to play live gurbani and later in the day her favourite singer's song. No wires, no pairing with phones. Drop in feature is amazing too. It comes in handy at times when the phone is not nearby. All in all, an amazing product from amazon.

name: Abhinav A.
title: No better deal at 2999.
review: This barely needs introduction. A mind blowing product and frankly for 2999 there's no better option. The sound quality is fantastic and a significant upgrade compared to the previous Gen. The response is snappy which, to be honest is all you could ask for in a smart speaker. The only issue is that unlike the 2nd Gen it's not all that portable. The fact that it always needs an AC input limits its usability and versatility. I'm planning to use a step-up dc to dc convertor and power it with a Power Bank. I'm positive it should work however sound distortion at higher volume could be an expected consequence. Anyway I'll update if it works as planned.

name: Noel Jessica
title: MUST BUY SUPERB TECHNOLOGY
review: Very very impressive and helpful product. Voice commanding is apt n perfect. Easy way of installation n pairing devices. We're presently using this much for alarms, reminders, music, lights and AC in room.. awesome technology.

name: PM
title: You can go for it as long as the price is 2500
review: I have used it extensively for the past four months it is absolutely fantastic product even the sound quality as well as the loudness is comparable to some high end devices

name: Binu G.
title: Impressed
review: Was skeptical whether to buy it or not. But after the purchase feel so happy that I bought it because my daughter loved it a lot. She keeps interacting with ALEXA. Pluse Alexa makes some of your tasks easy. Just go for it.

name: Nikhaar
title: Alexa - your home partner for ever.
review: Awesome sound. Great features and skills. Does what it is meant for.Getting better day by day.However few negatives, doesn't understand Hindi. At times behaves erratic - you ask something it does something else.Cannot search proper song which are not on Saavn or Amazon music.Just wish it can connect to YouTube and do Google search.

name: Vikas Maheshwari
title: Great product for ur home.
review: Got this in Rs.2000 with one plus tv. Sound quality is surprisingly nice. Alexa is fun it can help u on various things didn't find anything bad.

name: Gaurav
title: No want this product.
review: I have bought this product....this product work good in the 1st day...after that this product automatically disconnected again and again....every time show red light...I have checked the same issue to connect with other wifi connection....but issue not resolved...

name: shirish singh
title: Over all experience of around 3 years.
review: Good product superficiallly if you expect to work as youtube or google you will be disappointed but yea ask time, reminder alarm news few popular songs its ok....had it worked as google or youtube man I would have given it a 5 star

name: Atul  ku. Sinha
title: A Good friend in home.
review: Nice speaker. Voice recognition is fine. It keeps us busy.sound quality is marvellous. Only problem I get that after power failure this device take long time to reconnect with the wifi. More over, wifi changing process is a bit difficult.

name: AKSHAY TYAGI
title: Worth buying
review: Good product... bought it during EOSS for around 1999/- make sure you buy whenever the product is cheaper than the regular price... wait for amazon big sale period...

name: SJindal
title: Great speaker... Skill needs a tad more improvement
review: A great speaker love the sound.... And impressive voice recognitionCould do a tad better on the Alexa software as it takes location from the language you set also particular language settings only work with a particular skill... Also a youtube cast skill would be great

name: eIshphaqPla
title: A must have
review: For small rooms there is no problem, but for big, microphone even though 4 already there seem inadequate, even at short distance some times it reply for something u never asked. But for kids to learn it without any questions is of great help and importance, though still needs a lot of work

name: aneeru
title: very good
review: sound quality is superb. it work fantastic if internet connection is good otherwise it does not work smoothly.Bluetooth function is not of good range. overall it is very good

name: Not Sure
title: Best Echo Dot so far :)
review: have been using echo dot 2nd gen when it was launched. using smart bulbs and a smart air purifier with it all works like a charm and about the new echo dot 3rd gen its more louder than the old gen and you can use (connect both echo dots together to play music) only bad thing is it now uses a proprietary charger (old ones use a micro usb cable) need more skills tho and they said support for fire tv will be added soon (November)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
review: Any one buying this product should understand that Amazon will keep the voice prints and have recordings. However using the echo for calling is an outstanding feature as it does allow one to speak in areas where the mobile signal is poor or congested over the WiFi. Using the speaker is super easy.

name: Adwitiya Nimawat
title: Great companion with very good smart feature
review: Very good product work like an assistant of you so useful I tried it with the Wipro smart home bulb and works really amazing and Alexa she will give you a company you will enjoy in every sense great product

name: Kannu
title: This is the eco to have in the bedroom
review: Perfect size, beautiful looks and a design which oozes premium. Thats eco dot for you.Gets surprisingly loud and is a great bed side companion.A must buy if you want to enter the world of alexa.

name: Pawan
title: Crystal clear Sound quality , understands everything
review: The sound quality is too good, after listening to it i am planning to change my home theatre. It understands words spoken by my lil daughter that good. I am so happy now time will tell about durability.

name: SrinivasaRao
title: Good & Value for money @2349
review: Value for money, The best thing i found is you can play amazon music app songs on alexa device. But poor in voice recognisation in selecting song . Sound you feel awasome.

name: Manas Kumar Mukhopadhyay
title: GREAT  SERVICES ALL OF YOU
review: Thankyou Amazon.in Provides me Next Generation 3rd Alexa Digital Devices to Deliver me . I Hope it's Items are Used And before Review, But Great Services and Great prices for your any Other Provides Products for The World Famous Shopping Application So..Reviews 5/5 ....... Thank you so much.

name: Saksham Arora
title: Needs heck loads of improvement
review: I'd not choose this item bcoz it lacks basic things nor does it assist u as desiered

name: umesha
title: I never by this product very bad service and charges am paid
review: Very badAm used 1 year not good quality of product don’t buy anyoneNow it not connected by wifi and service charge may be same rate of new echo dot and also no one can response for service after paying service chargesAm send 1 month before only a problem of wifi connection to near service place but I didn’t received my echo dot after paying chargesVery bad service

name: Supriy B.
title: Alexa was not fine, but with some changes it's running fine
review: Iam getting the below mentioned message, how do I set the Alexa for Amazon.inIt looks like your account is set up for Amazon.com! Click here to visit the Skill Store on Amazon.com and browse skills available for your device

name: Amazon Customer
title: Alexa is versatile when it comes to features and voice recognition, including whispering....
review: Kudos to product design and thought behind Alexa. We are enjoying being lazy when it comes to smart light, music, story, jokes and much more. Its a good buy.

name: Fazal Rahman
title: Echo.. Alexa (My day Incomplete without you)
review: I have been using from a year almost... Just amazing for all your day to activities, controlling bedroom (lights, AC, Fan) to many other appliances. Connect to Laptop, Mobile, and enjoy.This is my second purchase.

name: MGRKKD
title: Ok
review: Poor finishing of the product. Not expected from Amazon. Working is normal .Not at all satisfied with the finishing...that is reason for 3-stars rating.

name: Amyra
title: Ok ok
review: Firstly when i comes to me it follow my instructions very fast...now it doesnot follow my command fastly...so according to my perception 3 stars are enough

name: Atul Kumar
title: Waste of money
review: Nothing exceptional about it. Average sound quality. Actually it's waste of money. Alexa integrates to very limited apps and that too from Amazon only. It's made in china and Amazon is intentionally hiding it.

name: RAJIV BALAKRISHNAN
title: Worth the price. Sound, voice recognition is efficient
review: Excellent product with very good voice recognition. Sound quality is equally good and sufficient for 2bhk house.The only con and I think the most important vital thing absent is that it works only when you plug it to power. It is not wireless.Probably the next generation should have this

name: Akkapeddi Syam Sunder
title: Amazing product with practically not much use.
review: Product is very good, amazing and excellent. But what is the special use of this device for common indian. Nothing. If you have smart gadgets in your house, then ok.Its on and off that smart gadgets with your voice command. Other than that no use. All other works like playing songs , alaram, time, etc. Etc. Etc. what this product will do, your smart phone will do better than this.

name: NAAZ
title: Poor customer support service. Waste.
review: Very poor voice recognition. Very very poor customer support service as I'm raising my issue that Alexa is become too much slow to respond even on home WiFi but none of the responded to me till. Watse of money. Don't buy.

name: Nayan m.
title: May be a good purchase?
review: The sound quality is good at low volume but when you increase the volume it get distorted sound gets really hursh. Low end gets compressed. They need to improve the sound dude surely not for audio enthusiasm but for daily tasks. Got it at just 2k including smart LED I think it gets its value. Bluetooth connection is poor. I don't if i like it or not.

name: Abhinav
title: Nice Speaker
review: Alexa Pairs easily, acts as a nice bluetooth speaker. Sound is awesome specially bass. I owe a 2nd gen echo amd take my word 3rd gen echo is n times better than last in sound quality. Worthy successor.Special thanks to Amazon for quick replacement of my echo device.Only thorn in the foot is software. Sometimes fail to search desired music.

name: Madhusudan
title: good product
review: we had received one earlier and now bought the second one. the sound is very good and alexa also responds well. one can good net connectivity else it may not work.

name: Pratima
title: it is unable to find things from Google
review: It is unable to find things from Google even it can't find songs or stories from Google. It only works when i connect it with Spotify aap. Then what is the use of this alexa. Spotify and other aaps are in my ph, then why i need to buy this alexa. It never work with Google. It never search things by own with the help of Google. It needs aap like Spotify and other aaps.

name: Ashwani
title: Wonderful
review: A really good product by Amazon, it has a very good sound output and recognizes the voice and commands very well, it is very good as compared to Google nest mini, on basis of sound, commands and output, the Amazon Alexa is always the winner according to me, if u are planning to buy, and confused about Alexa and nest mini, I would suggest u alexa, the rest is up choice

name: Durgesh
title: Poor Apple Music Integration
review: Not good at Apple Music integration; 4 out of five times it fails to understand clearly given instructions on playing my Apple Music Playlists... and plays playlists of its own choice.

name: anish
title: Awesome alexa
review: Pros1.Good speaker2.aux out facility3.easy to connect4.premium look5.long enough adapter cable6.good micCons1.Difficulty in searching songs especially malayalam songs2.Not enough strength for antenna for picking up low strength wifi signal3.sometimes speaker gets noisy or extra vibration4.Very difficult to connect using Bluetooth5.Non availability of Google products

name: Mohan iyer
title: A new family member
review: We feel like we have one more family member at home.Alexa is very friendly. She is funny sometimes. We enjoy with her. She is good assistant. She knows everything. A caretaker to grandparents. A friend to youngsters. She knows almost everything. I cant describe in words.A must buy for every home.Buy immediately

name: Reyas Muhammed
title: Value for Money💰, Very Good App
review: Its really nice to see Amazon Having A such user friendly smart device, the skills on the Alexa app are pretty dope, Although Sound Quality was a little dis-satisfactory, But Overall Its a Really Good Product, According to its price.

name: Anurag K.
title: Add some echo to your life
review: The sound quality is great and alexa is really helpful in doing small chores like booking cab, controlling smart devices like smart bulbs, playing music. Also has additional skills like "help me sleep", games etc. Worth the buy at combo price of 3200 with wipro smart led bulb. Only draw back is alexa cannot combine queries. One cannot give two commands at same time.

name: milan kapur
title: Decent
review: Sound is okay for a small speaker. It can't hear you if the volume is more than 60-70%. Don't buy it if you have a heavy accent. Alexa is great and the speaker affordable 👍🏼

name: Ashwani
title: Recognize 6 years old kid voice and it supports both Hindi/English languages
review: I got it yesterday's morning and have been using since then. Voice recognition is awesome. It also recognizes my 6 years old daughter's voice perfectly. Sound quality is superb. In the language, select Hindi/English to use both languages simultaneously i.e. you can use both languages at the same time. It is useful especially nowadays it seems a friend to kids and avoid screen time.

name: Rohit S.
title: Best product.
review: The media could not be loaded.  Good sound quality and voice recognition is good.

name: Tanaya Sarang
title: Satisfied
review: Alexa is one step to get information of whatever you want. Its voice recognition is also good, can go sometimes confused. The problem I have is, its not wireless, it has to be continously plugged in at a corner. Plus there are few features which needs upgradation, for eg maths calculation. Some math calculations alexa couldn't do. Overall satisfied with the product

name: John
title: I think i made a mistake , should have gone for google mini
review: I am totally bored , this device have crappy software and limited number of uses unlike its counterpart google mini. I made a terrible mistake buying it. I would love to return this if it weren't for the return period being over.

name: Sunny K.
title: The best Home Assistant one can have.
review: Alexa mostly understands everything, but still there are some simple things that she wasn't able to search and get results. Like i asked who is General M M Narvane. But she wasn't able to tell anything. Not even she told anything about current Navy Chief. These are some loopholes. But other than that i have found her amazing overall on every aspect.

name: Indrapal singh
title: Please I don't get any bulb, as per your given statement. Please send bulb as early as possible.
review: Device is not open till now, please send one bulb

name: Sawan Mattoo
title: Not That Much Worth
review: Everything is good...But A battery not fixed in it brings it to the dislike category and it really hasn't that much good sound...I mean its good but its not that much loud which it should be(considering the price range).Had not been there The Dolby Atmos and the Artificial Intelligence(Alexa Assistant),it would have been a crap. U can buy other bluetooth speakers at just 1k-2k(Brands like-Boat,JBL,Mivi etc) which have much loud sound than these ones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good and entertaining.
review: Good product. I bought in place of Bluetooth speaker. Happy to buy....full entertainment. News update from NDTV is boring and stale (old). NDTV as usual...does not update news. Elena should also collaborate with other news agency for fast update. Music seems on from Savan.

name: Vikrant
title: A genuine review after 1 mnth
review: Its good but also there shoul be option to olay songs from your mobile when internet not available.....also it should have integrated battery so that it act as portable speaker....instead of round power socket it shoul have micro usb so that it can be use with any power adapter or cable...

name: Akshay
title: Eco Dot is good...  Can  be better
review: The speaker is good...sound quality...built quality is all goodBut it is so difficult and sometimes irritating to connect the echo dot with the network of your own mobile...It doesn't connects easily...And also if you ask like what is the distance from delhi to mumbai...it gives you the answer....and then if you ask how to get there...it doesn't understands... though my location is on...This is where google home plays betterNeed to work on its AI a bit more....

name: Rajath
title: Excellent product
review: I bought it in 2019 during Amazon festival offer, worth for the money.I have set the alarm in morning to play suprabatha and devotional songs, so I wake up hearing that.I use it to control my Wipro WiFi light and batten. I can even ask it to switch specific channel on my Airtel Xtrem set up box.Excellent device.

name: sudeep kumar
title: Not following my voice command
review: My Alexa echo for is not responding to my voice command.Till setup everything was ok.But not responding to any of my voice command

name: Pritesh
title: Happy with this product
review: Who love technology this product is good for them & im happy with this product but it’s more interesting when you by other eco devices with it like WiFi switches, WiFi bulbs

name: Abhilash R
title: Performance of Echo Dot.
review: Expectations are more like acts as search engine. Only good in music rather than action of search engine. Sounds quality is good. Voice assistance is very good that expected. Expectations are more rather than music performance.

name: ZAS
title: Good
review: Other things are very good but some times difficult make it understand which song i want. As if u want to hear zinda hai to from bhag milkha bhag it will never understand until u tell it singer name

name: K.GIRIDHAR RAO
title: utility of echo dot
review: 1} did not like much because it's usage is very limited. not so popular in india still.2} Also you could have offered Amazon Echo also for the purchases more than 2 lakhs.you could have offered few more items also to accelerate the sales promotions

name: LikeToShop
title: 3rd gen Echo dot from stone age Era!!!
review: Hardware is so good. But the command recognition is the worst. Audio quality is bad. I have Google home mini the first gen product and got this echo dot 3rd gen as my gift. Still this 3rd gen echo dot is not eligible even for comparison with Google home first gen.

name: Navin Chandra Nigam
title: Dont buy
review: This Alexa is from different planet as she doesn't understand our language and choices. Leave alone h hindi, even english is tough for her. Asking Indian bhajan or songs are difficult to comprehend. Ask any question of history, she goes in future.

name: Sugeesh
title: Wonderful Gadget !!
review: Amazon Echo Dot is a fantastic product, much better compared to previous version. Better Sound. Totally loved it. However Alexa doesn't have answer to some of the question (ex: Alexa Who is the first grandmaster in Chess ) , hence one star less. It can integrate lot of Smart devices, Alexa skills are getting better every day. I must say proud piece of AI speaker to own !!

name: Akarshan
title: Good for the price you pay
review: The media could not be loaded.  Good for the price but sometimes while playing the song she doesn't responds me ......and yes those who think that there will be a Amitabh bacchan voice then the ans is no as you have to buy his voice for 99 rs/- overall it is a good product and the bulb is also good quality takes up every command😁😁

name: Amazon Customer
title: If it had an inbuilt battery....
review: I liked the product but if it had an inbuilt battery that would have been terrific....annoying that we have to connect it to a power socket every time....hope amazon looks into it in the next gen model...

name: MerajWani
title: Not as good as 2nd generation echo dot
review: The new 3rd Generation echo dot is not as good as Amazon claims...I think 2nd generation is better than 3rd generation in almost all aspects mic being the top most... You can't use it more than 10 feets away but 2nd generation I am using that 20 feets or more.

name: Shaikat sarkar
title: Bluethooth conection is good but the(when connected to bluethooth) sound quality is like normal on
review: Every thing is fine i can connect it with my Android's wifiYou don't need hotspot if ur mobile has wifi you can easily use thisI listen most of the songs on this but some songs are not available on thisBut that is really small number of songs if you want to buy prime member ship you will get all the songs.one thing disappointed me that when i connect my Bluetooth it soung like normal cheap speaker i don't know why.

name: ANIRUDDHA BANDYOPADHYAY
title: Just awesome at this price...
review: BBD SALE: 1800/- for device with wipro 9w smart bulb. Considering price it's just superb. Software is the main drawback of this device wich will definitely be shorted out in coming days through firmware upgrade. Quality wise it's enough for this price point.

name: Dhiraj
title: Irritating this alexa
review: Not up to the mark its irritating while listening. Not able to recognize the voice frequently.nd lso facing issues while connecting with phone not able to operate sometimes 😈😈😈

name: Zidane
title: What can I say that hasn't already been said
review: This might sound elitist but the Indian accent of Alexa is a little grating if you are accustomed to the westernised Indian accent. This is the 3rd generation device so it functions much better than the 2nd generation one. A lot of room for improvement though, which I trust Amazon would definitely be on it.

name: Peeyush
title: Not happy with quality.
review: Sometime won't recognize voice. Sound quality poor sometime. Better to explore other options.

name: Amol Thakre
title: Just a speaker needs lots of improvement
review: I like only product view but so many things Alexa don't know or unable to find anything I want, I want it to carry anywhere but it's not built in battery/ needs USB data cable connection to connect with my laptop or PC so many things needs to improve, still today it's just a speaker with cable power supply without battery power

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very upset add marathi language  Jai hind Jai Maharashtra
review: I dislike due to there is no Marathi language so add it marathi also while seeking in Maharashtra so add it

name: Rahul Kumar
title: My kid love playing with this
review: Me and my four year son really love this. It keeps him engaged and help him in learning language as well. I am enjoying this product. Interactive device, if you have good internet connection, then you should have it.

name: anil
title: Regarding Quality
review: 1)Kindly improve the sound quality of speaker, its not good2)Its not responding properly for voice command, kindly provide strong mike system3)provide USB and Inbuilt battery in it, so we can take it any where.

name: Shameer
title: Need for the Improvement
review: Not sophisticated.. In times it is great but not every time. Alexa many a times never interprets, if you ask to play music then the same playlists are repeated, if you ask 'what can you do' the same top 3 are repeated, it's playable, its funny but there's a huge space to grow..

name: Kishore
title: Poor connectivity system
review: It takes two different wi fi systems to setup the device on a mobile. Moreover it's vert tricky to install on wi fi hotspot on a single mobile device. Even trying for continuous 4 hours I am not able to install a wifi hotspot mobile network. A very good audio device and a very poor technology.

name: Gautam Nandakumar
title: Alexa is amazing!
review: Amazing product.. Can recognize voice easily & plays music, tells information etc clearly & fast. Quality & look of the speaker is awesome. I use it in my cafe & comes very handy. Can do work & enjoy at the same time.

name: bimal
title: Need to buy Amazon Prime Music subscription as well along with this device
review: New Echo dot gen 3 is good and my children are making more sense out of how to use it. It requires prime music subscription (about Rs 1000 pa) which I feel amazon should be giving complementary with alexa.Apart from that, the user experience is good , evolving alongwith everyday.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not satisfied with customer service
review: For product connectivity I called amazon customer service centre but they didn’t give one information to me, they keep hold me around 30 minutes and in this period they r not respond one time so I want to return this item dew to unsatisfactory of amazon service

name: AJR
title: The Sound Quality
review: The sound quality may be improved. The quality of the sound is not good, not clear and more bass. The same may be improved. Now a days so many small speakers are there but they are very clear and good clarity. At this side the Amazon may work on this.

name: Deepika
title: Must buy u will feel good and fantastic🤘😝🤘
review: Lovely one... Very glad to have this realy it's awesome... Only one thing is that i ordered grey and received black... Please exchange with grey color... Otherwise nice device sound is ok for light music and and party music bit small... Thanks amazon love u

name: SumedhaAndhare
title: A very useful device.
review: I liked everything about it but at the starting it was hard to connect it. But it is a good device it could hear from a very long distance and it's sound quality is also very nice. At the end I can say that it is an awesome product by Amazon.

name: Dev Kumar
title: Unable to connect to wifi
review: Stopped connecting to WIFi after 2 weeks of use , and not connecting to WIFi at all even other devices are working well with same router

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth the money and technology
review: The device needs skills to run and understand voice command. There are very few skills which are useful for day to day routine. The device needs to be plugged in to power always which is make disadvantage. Wouldn't recommend to buy

name: Ravi
title: Alexa useful but not a must have product
review: Good speaker quality. Good only if you are a gadget freak. Helps a bit in improving listening and speaking skills. Price is a bit high. Would have been a good one if it had battery and USB power connection. Also would be great if it turns to be a bit more advanced which takes voice command over Sim card, can do wonders.

name: Sujay Gudi
title: Not upto the mark
review: The echo dot is overall good and looks better than the gen 2, but Alexa does not speak in the Indian English. I tried a lot in the Alexa app to change it, but does not seem available. The Alexa app is also quite slow in responding.Worst part is Alexa does not read any kind of stories and always asks for an Audible subscription or anything which is available in Kindle.

name: SHREYAS CN
title: Product for the future not now xD
review: The product is very good...... But there is not much u can do with it right now..... Just some news, music n light operations tats allSmart homes are a long way to come by.

name: Vimald
title: Best gift to my parents ever
review: Best gift I have given my parents... They are all old to new songs without any hassles... The voice recognition for Indian is really awesome... It can detect our English easily

name: Kev
title: Nice to have
review: Echo dot is a very useful device for home use. I bought these products at a huge discount, so I guess I didn't get the same product quality when ai bought it at the original price. I would recommend to buy the latest version (4) as it has better grasping skills in Hindi language

name: Avi Prakash
title: Good 👍 buy
review: Best buy u should try it, it is big in size . It is good And it has good voice recognization. It has best sound quality. It has special features.It Is very smart.............And I wanted it from long time and next i will buy the echo dot 4th generation

name: kaypratap
title: good for fixed location
review: the sound quality is not that good form this speaker. it is very fast in fetching the information. Concept is very Good . amazon should improve the sound quality. i have not tried any other speaker. if such thing is availble from Sony i will buy it and through this echo dot to dust bin.

name: suman ghosh
title: Very helpful, please add more features for blind people and please add Bengali (Indian language)
review: Please add Sunday Suspense from Radio Mirchi Kolkata or YouTube as skills ( Popular Bengali audio stories), because my mother is completely blind and Alexa is helping with automation, I information, calling and entertaining her a lot as Alexa is the only companion, when we go out for work, thank you Amazon, please try to upgrade.If you want any assistance regarding any new ideas, please fill free to call 9836363130

name: Amazon Customer
title: DON'T BUY THIS
review: In short : Do not buy it. Waste of time and energy and money.Poor software. Not up to the expectation.It uses Saavn or prime to get songs. The playlist is very limited. it will not allow to play our favorite song. Always need to adjust and play with available 20 odd songs.What ever question we ask, it say " hmmm, I do not about that" . Or it will not respond.Using only as bluetooth speaker. Other than that its waste to buy.Google Mini home is much better than is moron device.

name: Ronak Modi
title: Replaced Saregama Caravan with echo dot
review: Super useful. Specially ordered for my parents. Helpful for them as this device understands and speaks in Hindi. The Hindi can be improved though... Best replacement for Saregama Caravan.

name: Sam
title: Best smart speaker in town
review: “First impression is last impression” really echo is a best companion of all time... sound really good rich bass treble everything what you need to rock the floor....Really appreciate you people work behind of this project..Really amazon cheers

name: Manojayyappan
title: Must have
review: It is a fantastic gadget to have if you have the prime subscription..works seamlessly as expected,although the sound quality and range of detection(hey alexa) could have been better..but no complaints for the money paid.

name: P K CHAKRAVARTY
title: Customer support for setting up Alexa Echo Dot 3rd Gen
review: Very difficult to setup Echo Dot 3rd generation. Unable to add device to Amazon Alexa App for the last 7 hours. Direct customer support should be available to help. Email sent.

name: petchiammal
title: Read this before you buy
review: This is a superb device. The voice recognition works very very well than I expected. The only drawback in this device is this device dosen't have a inbuilt battery so it can't be operated wirelessly

name: Ashu Boyz
title: Echo Dot Is Amazing.
review: The product Is Very Good i'm Happy,But Shipping Packaging Is Not Secure That Box Has Dent In The Bottom Side.But Nothing Is Damage.It's Working Execellent.

name: Rakesh
title: Awesome product by Amazon!!
review: Happy with sound quality. Not required amazon prime. I'm using it free without any subscriptions.For 1500 sqft home Alexa dot is a perfect device we don't need additional speakers.Clever answers collection. I have attached one smart bulb with this and it is well controlled by Alexa.OVERALL VALUE OF MONEY PRODUCT MUCH BETTER THAN GOOGLE MINI :)

name: Desabandhu
title: Good product...price is bit igh
review: Good product..initially ordered for Rs.3499 and on the same day suddenly reduced to 2999 by the same seller. Canceleld the first order immediately and ordered for 2999. But today at independence day sale it is just available for 2000. Configuration to our network and setup is tedious.but I managed..the process needs to be even more simple..

name: Umesh Choudhary
title: Working erratically
review: 1. Voice recognition is poor esp with accompanying Wipro smart bulb.2. It frequently says that "it is not able to connect to internet" however it works fine after it is RESET. So the problem is not internet.

name: Buyeratamazon
title: Wipro bulb is not good!
review: I have a problem with the Wipro bulb only... (Alexa is great).. The bulb only connects with a 2.4Ghz wifi which is not much used these days. So if u don't have the required wifi the white ligh even work properly. To use the light and colours u can use a hotspot but I bet the hotspot won't stay on for entire time.

name: Ambarish
title: It just works for songs and reminders
review: What I liked, voice recognition, sound quality and hardware quality.What I didn’t like, in India not able to control my android tv by voice command. They should release an official app now for android and Sony tv.

name: Uday Pratap Goswami
title: Alexa better than Google
review: See guys if you'll over-all compare this speaker with its only competitor in the market that is google home.Definitely you should pick alexa as it is more convenient , has lot if skills , better sound quality in comparison , the 3.5 mm jack connectivity , Bluetooth connectivity etc etcChoose alexa echo dot over Home mini

name: Bhavik Chudasama
title: good device
review: alexa echo is good and recognize but choice in amazon music is low than jiosaavan and youtube music. Received wipro smart bulb but after start within 1-minute it stop working and turn off than not started again. to replace that

name: Dili
title: Not a great product
review: Two absolutely big drawbacks. Firstly, you cannot ask Alexa to play anything from YouTube. So, we all know what that means. We only have access to Amazon music. The next very important thing is with calling your contacts. Alexa can call only those of your contacts that have the Alexa app installed on their smart phones. I purchased this for my MIL who is not adept at smart phones. I thought this will help her call her contacts through Alexa voice commands. But then most of her contacts are also not very tech savvy and most of them don't have the app installed. So, the calling feature is also of not much use. I am in fact planning to return

name: Kalpesh
title: Just Go For it..!!
review: Pretty good speaker with some smart features... I bought this just to connect to my big speaker via Bluetooth and listen to my favourite songs without using my mobile... But the sound quality is sop awesome I use it by default by not connecting my big Bluetooth speaker... As echo dot has great bass and volume...

name: Nitin
title: Over all Good product. Only drawback is, Battery is not available
review: Overall product is very good and value of money.. Also sounds quality is very good like JBL Flip4. Alexa responding very well in this 3rd generation device. Only drawback is, Battery is not available in this device. You need to connect with power supply to use this.

name: Kiran Alhat
title: Simply love it
review: Sometimes she doesn't recognise command, like if you say Alexa play song dillagi and she will play dil song. Rest is good. Once you are familiar with the skills and tricks than you'll simply rock.

name: Suvendu Samanta
title: lot of hype but less usefull
review: There are lot of hypes around alexa. Echo dot sound quality is good but Alexa system horrible. No matter how it has capability of recognizing the voices, but very poor search engine is used to retrive the content.

name: Rishi
title: Issues with alexa
review: Very difficult to give instructions to Alexa.Very limited search function. Even for one song , need to give multiple instructions.

name: srivatsa gs
title: Problem with alexa
review: Its connectivity with vividhbarathy is very poor and it doesn't recognise many of the items. It says I'm unable to understand/support. Hence I'm unable to listen to many of the songs as per my taste.What can be done for this. Please helpThanks..srivatsa

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor durability, high repairing cost
review: Had a bad experienced with this product, inoperational exactly after 1 year of purchase. And repairing cost is too costly...they ask me 2k for repair. Why should I pay 2k when I can get new for 3k... totally disappointed :( don't purchase it for long term use.

name: A.M.D.
title: Need more skills.
review: Alexa skill set is still less in India. More to come. As of now, Echo Dot is excellent for listening to Music and for setting timers. Quality is very good. Fire TV integration is not in full swing currently; you can play movies/videos from Amazon Prime Video only. Other video apps like Netflix, Hotstar etc. are not supported yet.

name: Krutika
title: Superb sound quality but its AI has a long way to go.
review: Superb sound quality. However, the AI needs lots of work. It's understanding & ability to follow the instructions is limited. The inability to call & message a non Alexa user is another lacking point. Too many widgets need to be added for Alexa to pick out & read something as simple as news. The limitations of the device have been cleverly hidden or demphasized in the promotions. Unless one has multiple Alexa compatible devices (headphones, TV stick,etc) the use of Echo seems limited.

name: Abhijit
title: Smart is Smart
review: Good as already seen this in one of my relatives house. good sound output.

name: TVSR
title: Good...needs to tweak for regional songs...
review: Initially I had problem as echo dot was not recognising regional songs. After changing language to English India it started recognising the commands for regional songs. The alexa app should have option to select location instead of selecting automatically UK (as the default settings for mobile is UK or US.)

name: Kanwar
title: Great Speakers
review: Great speaker. Sound quality is great. Bought as a starter with a little apprehension about ability of Alexa to comprehend indian accent. Works fantastically. And keeps the kids engaged. Trying it with smart home products. Will update

name: Prakash P.
title: Device is working with interrupted voice...
review: Overall it is a very good device, I started use it since 5 days only. At first it was working perfectly,but from yesterday I marked a defect that the device can't streaming audio continuously . It is working with interrupted voice......so sad. Plz suggest me how to solve it.

name: Manindra Paul Singh
title: Excellent product. Very useful for home automation.
review: Excellent product. Very useful for home automation.Echo should be able to remember multiple WiFi networks and automatically able to connect to network which is ON. At present it is not able to do that without forgetting existing network.

name: Anil
title: Alexa is learning - But its good AI experience
review: After 1 month of usePositives1. Sound quality bass is good2. Treble is not in control3. Wifi integration cumbersome, but once done stays there4. Alexa is learning, but google is better

name: Arpit
title: Loved Alexa!
review: Amazing product....great innovation.Frankly i was in a dilemma between alexa bad Google home mini but finally i bought it in great Indian summer sale and i couldn't be happier.( No offense to google mini)

name: sunil kumar padmanabhuni
title: Unable to play songs. Very bad at recognising what is required by user.
review: Horrible integration with apps. It cannot play songs requested. Thought some of the songs are available in gaana it's always integrating with Amazon music where there are not many songs.

name: Divyam
title: Issue with the Microphone
review: UPDATE- GOT MY ALEXA REPLACED BY AMAZON.(Mic works fine now)THE NRW ONE WORKS FINE. BUT THE SOUND QUALITY LEAVES ROOM FOR IMPROVEMENT. Mic isn't proper. Please return this product.It feels like there is a problem with my device only.It cannot her me at 1st or 2nd time. after I speak the wake work multiple times then it hears.

name: Sukanya
title: Not good for anything apart from music
review: I am very unhappy with this product.. Wish i never bought it.. Its good for only music in long run. can't even give my baby correct information for general science questions and other necessary info.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great Fun Next Gen Product
review: Excellent. Alexa learns day by day and helps in many things. This is Where the technology is headed at present. Very receptive on voice commands for many things. Can be a great fun as well.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Highly recommended....it's quite good...do try...🤗
review: I liked the product....it's great...nd sound quality is quite good.The only fault I discovered is the recognition of voice... actually Alexa is unable to recognise voice fast...either it takes a lot of tym or sometimes it just don't even play the required stuff...nd i thnk the system is quite complex😅bt then it's in my case...the manual will help u quite.well, beginner will find it difficult to operate at first bt then u will get used to...

name: VAIBHAV B.
title: Value for money
review: Awesome product sound quality is very clear and good but buy it when it around 2000-2500 if you are buying above this price then it's too expensive not value for money

name: venkateshwarlu.uppara

name: ATN

name: Sandip Pol
title: Go for It. Value for money!👌

name: Shwetank Dhyani

name: Nilesh

name: Sakshi Bhargava
